title: VILLAGE / IDIOT DOOM SPIRAL
description: Idiot Doom Spiral Guy welcomes the return of Tequila Sunset! Tells the story of how you drove the car into the sea and drank with these drunks, and other tales of everything (in exchange of alcohol): cocaine skull, headless falnrider etc.

dialogueTree.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What can I do for you, boss-man?""
dialogueTree.text: "What can I do for you, boss-man?"

dialogueTree.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Here he is! The man, the reality,..."
dialogueTree.text: "Here he is! The man, the reality, the *financial czar*." He presents you to the group as if on a stage. "You seen it yet?"

links.title: You: ""The re-conceptualization? Yeah, I'..."
links.text: "The re-conceptualization? Yeah, I've seen it."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Great!" He scans your face for any..."
links.text: "Great!" He scans your face for any telltale signs of a verdict. "Great."

links.title: Composure: "He's struggling to cover up his ner..."
links.text: He's struggling to cover up his nerves now that he's having *one* less beer a day.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Well, no rush, but it'd be good to..."
links.text: "Well, no rush, but it'd be good to know what you make of it when you get a chance."

links.title: Composure: "He's covering up any nerves with th..."
links.text: He's covering up any nerves with the tried and true method -- excessive drinking.

links.title: You: ""The re-conceptualization? I had a..."
links.text: "The re-conceptualization? I had a quick look but I haven't really taken it in properly."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Oh, I see what you're doing. Keepi..."
links.text: "Oh, I see what you're doing. Keeping us waiting for the verdict, drawing it out -- I like it. Really builds up the suspense." He looks to his drinking partner. "Forever the showman, this one."

links.title: You: ""The re-conceptualization? I've bee..."
links.text: "The re-conceptualization? I've been busy with other things."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*Other* things? We're talking abou..."
links.text: "*Other* things? We're talking about your big moment here, your time to shine, your ascension into a household name."

links.title: You: ""Seen what?""
links.text: "Seen what?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""The re-conceptualization of the mo..."
links.text: "The re-conceptualization of the monument? Your new reality situation?" His words are stale with alcohol and utter disbelief.

dialogueTree.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Man, you're like, bleeding now. Re..."
dialogueTree.text: "Man, you're like, bleeding now. Reality's really messed you up."

dialogueTree.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Tequila Sunset." He nods in apprec..."

links.title: You: ""You want my opinion on the re-conc..."
links.text: "You want my opinion on the re-conceptualization?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, two secs." He slurps from hi..."
links.text: "Yeah, two secs." He slurps from his bottle then wipes droplets from his beard with a sleeve. Satisfied, his stomach sends a muted eruption to his throat, where it turns into a damp growl.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Right, let's hear you then. I put..."
links.text: "Right, let's hear you then. I put a lot of work into that project, Tequila, a *lot of work*. Had to bring back my hustle game and call in some old partners to pull it off. So, c'mon, tell me what I want to hear."

links.title: You: "(Applaud.) "I love it. Pure, naked..."
links.text: (Applaud.) "I love it. Pure, naked brilliance."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You love it? Shit, Tequila, that's..."
links.text: "You love it? Shit, Tequila, that's just made my day." His face lights up as his drinking buddy gives him a congratulatory pat on the back.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Gimme more, gimme more. What do yo..."
links.text: "Gimme more, gimme more. What do you like most about it?" He's giddy -- both from the drink and the anticipation.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "What more could you want? He got yo..."
links.text: What more could you want? He got your brand out there while giving back to the community. He hit the brief perfectly.

links.title: Conceptualization: "The utter *genius* of its design --..."
links.text: The utter *genius* of its design -- conveyed beautifully through his commitment to a singular aesthetic. He's gone above and beyond!

links.title: Endurance: "It's an image of you that will stan..."
links.text: It's an image of you that will stand the test of time. People will remember this for an age.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Picking the right praise to give is..."
links.text: Picking the right praise to give is just as important as picking the right critique. People shape themselves according to any and all feedback they get.

links.title: You: ""It's exactly the brand image I wan..."
links.text: "It's exactly the brand image I want to present to the public."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I knew it! That's what you get whe..."
links.text: "I knew it! That's what you get when you hire me -- customer satisfaction guaranteed. Woo!"

links.title: Shivers: "The wooden clack of bilboquet comes..."
links.text: The wooden clack of bilboquet comes to a halt before the central structure of a roundabout. Awe whistles through the air as the onlooker takes in every angle. Eager eyes fill nearby windows, brought to the glass by the sound of the toy, but now also taking in the sight of the striking new installation.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Bet you're glad you hired me as yo..."
links.text: "Bet you're glad you hired me as your Personal Brand Strategist now? So, what's next, boss?"

links.title: You: ""Sure am! Not sure what's next yet..."
links.text: "Sure am! Not sure what's next yet but I know you'll nail it."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You bet your ass I will. Tequila S..."
links.text: "You bet your ass I will. Tequila Sunset is just getting started. No one's ready for the shit we're going to pull." He beats his chest a couple of times. "Feels good to be back."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Thanks for this, boss. Just what I..."
links.text: "Thanks for this, boss. Just what I needed. Is there anything else I can do for you right now?"

links.title: You: ""Actually, I think you've done enou..."
links.text: "Actually, I think you've done enough for me. I no longer need you."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Good one, boss." He laughs weakly..."
links.text: "Good one, boss." He laughs weakly but stops when he realises you're being serious. "What -- really? That's it? You can't cut it short *now*. We're just getting started. At least give me an explanation."

links.title: You: ""Calm down! I'm only yanking your l..."
links.text: "Calm down! I'm only yanking your leg. Of course I'm not firing you."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He freezes in his seat, motionless..."
links.text: He freezes in his seat, motionless except his pupils, which quickly flick from side to side.

links.title: Volition: "Is he reading a book about his life..."
links.text: Is he reading a book about his life so far to figure out which reality he's in?

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Fucking hell, Tequila. Don't do th..."
links.text: "Fucking hell, Tequila. Don't do that to me. I appreciate being kept on my toes, but *man*!" He shakes his head to straighten himself out.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Let's just move on. Anything else..."
links.text: "Let's just move on. Anything else you want from me?"

links.title: You: ""The market moves fast and with ext..."
links.text: "The market moves fast and with extreme casualty."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Fine. You know what? Fuck it. You'..."
links.text: "Fine. You know what? Fuck it. You'll be back, Tequila. You wanna go -- you go. This isn't the end. I'm taking you all the way to the top."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He cracks open a bottle and sucks t..."
links.text: He cracks open a bottle and sucks the bitter foam welling at the top. "Do you want anything else or can I concentrate on my drinking?"

links.title: You: ""I've never seen marketing as inspi..."
links.text: "I've never seen marketing as inspired as that. It really is *high concept*!

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Didn't I tell you?" He turns to hi..."
links.text: "Didn't I tell you?" He turns to his drinking buddy. "I told him, didn't I? Several times. This is what I *do*."

links.title: You: ""This is an event. It's *history* -..."
links.text: "This is an event. It's *history* -- people will remember this."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Fuck yeah they will. Tequila Sunse..."
links.text: "Fuck yeah they will. Tequila Sunset is on the timeline. They'll be talking about you for years. The one and only."

links.title: You: ""I'm amazed you were able to do it..."
links.text: "I'm amazed you were able to do it so well and for so cheap."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's how I roll. Best results at..."
links.text: "That's how I roll. Best results at a low cost. Isn't that what the business game is all about? Let me tell you -- it is! I'm its biggest and best player." He winks at you.

links.title: You: ""It's good but the timing is unfort..."
links.text: "It's good but the timing is unfortunate."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What do you mean? The timing could..."
links.text: "What do you mean? The timing couldn't be *better*. The traffic through town will return now that the strike's over. Don't worry, I've *thought* about this."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Let your Personal Brand Strategist..."
links.text: "Let your Personal Brand Strategist handle the timing, alright? You just focus on telling me what you liked about my work up there."

links.title: You: ""It doesn't quite meet my expectati..."
links.text: "It doesn't quite meet my expectations."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's... disappointing. But, okay..."
links.text: "That's... disappointing. But, okay, I can work with that. I'm used to dealing with fussy clients and retrogressing from my highest concepts for them. Can't expect everyone to be on..." He points at himself with both thumbs. "...*this* level."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Go on then, what exactly isn't doi..."
links.text: "Go on then, what exactly isn't doing it for you?" He wraps both hands around his bottle and leans forward, ready to listen.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "It's bad PR and therefore bad for b..."
links.text: It's bad PR and therefore bad for business. Tell him you don't want anything to do with it -- or him.

links.title: Volition: "Be *professional*. He probably does..."
links.text: Be *professional*. He probably doesn't even know what happened to you, why the strike is over...

links.title: Drama: "It's like he knows *nothing* about..."
links.text: It's like he knows *nothing* about you. Stinks of a man doing what's best for him, not his clientele.

links.title: Half Light: "He dares to sit there in disbelief..."
links.text: He dares to sit there in disbelief when you confront him about his own *scam*!

links.title: You: ""I don't want anything to do with i..."
links.text: "I don't want anything to do with it. You have to take it down."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Take it down? Is it really that ba..."
links.text: "Take it down? Is it really that bad?" He drags a hand down his face. "This is *fucking me up*, Tequila. I thought you'd love it -- honestly."

links.title: Shivers: "Plastic bags heavy with tins and de..."
links.text: Plastic bags heavy with tins and deformed vegetables swing from the fists of a young mother crossing a roundabout. Her mouth falls open as she looks up at the central structure. 'C'mere, Luc. Over here now, please,' she says to her curious toddler. The bags beat steady bruises into the mother's calves as she hurries him away.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""So where does this leave us? Do yo..."
links.text: "So where does this leave us? Do you still want me as your Personal Brand Strategist or what?"

links.title: You: ""I do. I'm willing to give you anot..."
links.text: "I do. I'm willing to give you another chance."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Phew! Alright, you had me going th..."
links.text: "Phew! Alright, you had me going there. I thought that was it for me -- back to rock bottom I go!" He lets out a nervous laugh.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "He better not let you down again. R..."
links.text: He better not let you down again. Remember, this is *your* money and *your* reputation he's playing with.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Thanks for sticking with me. I'll..."
links.text: "Thanks for sticking with me. I'll make sure I do better in the future." He exhales with huge relief. "Let me make it up to you. Anything I can do right now?"

links.title: You: ""Nope. I'm going to have to let you..."
links.text: "Nope. I'm going to have to let you go."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Fuck..." He lets his head drop bet..."
links.text: "Fuck..." He lets his head drop between his arms. "Well, that's that. At least I tried." A long and heavy breath out, a few sloppy sucks on his bottle.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "He doesn't know whether to expunge..."
links.text: He doesn't know whether to expunge or consume. What will pacify the wrenching feeling in his gut?

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Thanks for the opportunity. Gutted..."
links.text: "Thanks for the opportunity. Gutted that I fucked it up... but what have I really lost?" He tries to shrug into a more carefree existence.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Do you want anything else? If not,..."
links.text: "Do you want anything else? If not, I've got some serious drinking to do..."

links.title: You: ""Your timing is awful! People died..."
links.text: "Your timing is awful! People died over there, then you go and do *that*."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What are you talking about? Who di..."
links.text: "What are you talking about? Who died? I think I would know if anyone had died over there. Would have heard *something* about it. There's no need to make up little stories, Tequila."

links.title: Composure: "You wince as your injured leg throb..."
links.text: You wince as your injured leg throbs with fresh pain. The drunk doesn't notice.

links.title: Drama: "Pretty sure you could dial up the m..."
links.text: Pretty sure you could dial up the melodrama to max and he still wouldn't figure it out.

links.title: You: ""That isn't the right image of me t..."
links.text: "That isn't the right image of me to present to the public."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It isn't? I thought that's what yo..."
links.text: "It isn't? I thought that's what you were all about." He drags a hand down his face. "This is *fucking me up*, Tequila. I thought you'd love it -- honestly."

links.title: You: ""It's a load of shit! I knew you'd..."
links.text: "It's a load of shit! I knew you'd rip me off."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What are you talking about? *Rip y..."
links.text: "What are you talking about? *Rip you off*? Stop with this bullshit. Just say you don't like it. There's no need to drag my name through the mud like this."

links.title: You: ""It's an all-round disaster. Just a..."
links.text: "It's an all-round disaster. Just awful."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You're kidding me? This is a joke?..."
links.text: "You're kidding me? This is a joke?" He hangs a confused look off you. "You're  being serious? Alright..." He takes a gulp of beer.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""'Awful' is very strong, Tequila. Y..."
links.text: "'Awful' is very strong, Tequila. You're gonna have to explain how I missed the mark by *so much* if that's the case. What don't you like about it?"

links.title: You: ""It's gonna have to wait. I have im..."
links.text: "It's gonna have to wait. I have important business to attend to first." (Put it off indefinitely.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What important business? I'm your..."
links.text: "What important business? I'm your *Personal Brand Strategist*, Tequila -- you're supposed to run all business matters by me. That's how this works."

links.title: You: ""This is different...""
links.text: "This is different..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Different *how*? Business is busin..."
links.text: "Different *how*? Business is business. Doesn't matter if it's small or large, I handle it for you now -- that's what you hired me to do."

links.title: You: ""It's police business.""
links.text: "It's police business."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""They finally caught up to you, hav..."
links.text: "They finally caught up to you, have they?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, they have," the lieutenant sa..."
links.text: "Yes, they have," the lieutenant says, unamused.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Alright, I understand. We'll do th..."
links.text: "Alright, I understand. We'll do this some other time, when you can focus on yourself and not this *inconvenience*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "You hear the lieutenant suppress an..."
links.text: You hear the lieutenant suppress an almighty scoff.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Painful images replay in the lieute..."
links.text: Painful images replay in the lieutenant's mind as he lies still in his sick bed: gun fumes, the flash of metal, and occasionally a clumsy stack of scaffolding...

links.title: You: ""Something like that...""
links.text: "Something like that..."

links.title: You: ""So I checked out the horseback mon..."
links.text: "So I checked out the horseback monument..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No one does it better than me, eh?..."
links.text: "No one does it better than me, eh?" He claps his hands in delight. "I was able to get it all together -- and *so fast* too. No wonder I used to be an industry leader..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Listen, I can feel it in my guts -..."
links.text: "Listen, I can feel it in my guts -- a bright future awaits you, the one and only *Tequila Sunset*! You're already building great brand equity. No doubt the profits will come rolling in shortly."

links.title: Half Light: "This little weasel still isn't owni..."
links.text: This little weasel still isn't owning up to *ripping you off*!

links.title: You: ""That's it? It's just a bunch of sc..."
links.text: "That's it? It's just a bunch of scaffolding!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Of course not. Your trademark will..."
links.text: "Of course not. Your trademark will be all over it as soon as the workers can get to it. The strike's holding them up. Not much I can do about that." He shrugs, then takes a swig from the bottle.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I *guarantee* the papers will pick..."
links.text: "I *guarantee* the papers will pick it up once it's all finished, with photos and everything. You'll be the talk of the town -- investing into the community, creating value, giving back..."

links.title: Empathy: "*Papers*? Maybe she'll read the pap..."
links.text: *Papers*? Maybe she'll read the papers and see your name... Maybe it will bring her back...

links.title: Shivers: "A woman is sitting by the kitchen t..."
links.text: A woman is sitting by the kitchen table, eating buttered toast and drinking herbal tea. She opens the Salzneben Report, a quarterly business magazine. There, in shiny tricolour print -- *him*, triumphant and victorious, like an apparition from the past...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Hey, your new Personal Brand Strate..."
links.text: Hey, your new Personal Brand Strategist still hasn't laid off the drink -- even though he promised.

links.title: Logic: "The strike might take forever... Ma..."
links.text: The strike might take forever... Maybe you should just cut your losses while you can.

links.title: You: ""Weren't you going to drink less wh..."
links.text: "Weren't you going to drink less while on the job?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Tequila... you know it isn't that..."
links.text: "Tequila... you know it isn't that easy yourself. I promise you I'm *working on it*." He winks, his fingers tightening around the bottle.

links.title: Volition: "He isn't 'working on it' -- he'll n..."
links.text: He isn't 'working on it' -- he'll never stop drinking.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He sighs. "It isn't that easy... Bu..."
links.text: He sighs. "It isn't that easy... But I'm working on it. I really am. I even signed up for this evening group in Jamrock."

links.title: Drama: "Sire, he's telling the truth."
links.text: Sire, he's telling the truth.

links.title: You: ""I wonder what the newspapers might..."
links.text: "I wonder what the newspapers might say..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What would you like them to say?""
links.text: "What would you like them to say?"

links.title: Suggestion: "Here's a man who knows how to play..."
links.text: Here's a man who knows how to play the media -- by starting with the right question.

links.title: You: ""Local bankruptcy curse lifted by s..."
links.text: "Local bankruptcy curse lifted by stock market mogul!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Very nice. You could be your own P..."
links.text: "Very nice. You could be your own PR agent, Tequila." He nods.

links.title: You: ""Nightclub owner reinvigorates yout..."
links.text: "Nightclub owner reinvigorates youth culture, makes a fortune!"

links.title: You: ""Philanthropist rescues local kid f..."
links.text: "Philanthropist rescues local kid from violent father, town pays tribute!"

links.title: You: ""Local detective solves murder whil..."
links.text: "Local detective solves murder while making his fortune!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But we *haven't* solved the murder..."
links.text: "But we *haven't* solved the murder yet," the lieutenant says. "We might have if you hadn't gotten distracted by this."

links.title: You: ""Wealthy businessman renovates loca..."
links.text: "Wealthy businessman renovates local eyesore!"

links.title: You: ""Alright, I trust you to deliver th..."
links.text: "Alright, I trust you to deliver the final final product." (Proceed with the quest.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Don't spend a single brain cell wo..."
links.text: "Don't spend a single brain cell worrying about it, just leave it all to me... the final outcome will be *spectacular*. Just takes a little time..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Anything else?" He throws one leg..."
links.text: "Anything else?" He throws one leg over another, smug and content.

links.title: You: ""I'm pulling the project. I don't h..."
links.text: "I'm pulling the project. I don't have confidence it will ever get finished." [Cancel the entire task.]

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""But Tequila..." He hangs his head..."
links.text: "But Tequila..." He hangs his head in despair. "For what? I really tried to make it work this time -- for you, for me, for the triumph of *high-concept* ideas..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""And I didn't even lose anything!"..."
links.text: "And I didn't even lose anything!" He stares into empty space, eyes like discarded bottle caps. "Okay, guess I'm back to where I was before. Square one. It's not like I haven't been here before."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Anything else you want?" He takes..."
links.text: "Anything else you want?" He takes an enormous swig from the bottle, swaying back and forth.

links.title: You: ""It was extraordinary. Truly a feat..."
links.text: "It was extraordinary. Truly a feat of the century to get that scaffolding up so fast."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Ya hear that, Rosie? I'm back -- *..."
links.text: "Ya hear that, Rosie? I'm back -- *big time*." He reaches over to his buddy to clink the bottles, then turns back to you.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""And that's only the start. Wait un..."
links.text: "And that's only the start. Wait until the strike's over and the workers can finally deliver the product. I *guarantee* the papers will pick it up. You'll be the talk of the town -- -- investing into the community, creating value, giving back..."

links.title: You: ""Listen, I know you're trying to *r..."
links.text: "Listen, I know you're trying to *rip me off*..." (Take a threatening step forward.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Whoa! Rip you off? What is this, a..."
links.text: "Whoa! Rip you off? What is this, a radio novella on Channel 8? Friends don't let friends start ripping each other off! No, that's not how we operate here."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Listen, I know it might look a lit..."
links.text: "Listen, I know it might look a little *lacking* right now, but you gotta trust the process. I've got it all under control. Once the strike is over, the workers will be all over the monument..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I *guarantee* the papers will pick..."
links.text: "I *guarantee* the papers will pick it up, with photos and everything. You'll be the talk of the town -- investing into the community, creating value, giving back..."

links.title: You: ""Let's talk about improving my pers..."
links.text: "Let's talk about improving my personal brand again..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Right on." He swigs his beer. "Hav..."
links.text: "Right on." He swigs his beer. "Have you made your mind up?"

links.title: You: ""Relevant experience?""
links.text: "Relevant experience?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I used to be a moderately-high-net..."
links.text: "I used to be a moderately-high-net-worth individual myself, if I can say so. I've *managed* big money before, played the game, hustled the movers of the marketing world..."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "A subtle smile lights up his puffy..."
links.text: A subtle smile lights up his puffy face, like a ray of sun breaking through the stratosphere. He likes reminiscing.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""At the Boom Boom Room I directed a..."
links.text: "At the Boom Boom Room I directed a team of *talent architects*. People so high concept their names were nothing but a single letter. We had *manic* ideas, fuelled by copious amounts of coffee-flavoured whey powder. We did stuff no one had ever seen before -- or *since*!"

links.title: Conceptualization: "We're going to need examples here -..."
links.text: We're going to need examples here -- just going by one of your initials doesn't cut it.

links.title: Logic: "You're after measurable performance..."
links.text: You're after measurable performance, not tales of happy memories. Numbers, please! How many years did he work, what profits did he earn?

links.title: You: ""Like what -- any examples?""
links.text: "Like what -- any examples?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Remember when Maria Kapaleva cause..."
links.text: "Remember when Maria Kapaleva caused an uproar by walking the red carpet in those slippers -- the ones with the stick-on jiggly tits?"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Yes, yes we *do* remember that..."
links.text: Yes, yes we *do* remember that...

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That was *me*. I did that." He loo..."
links.text: "That was *me*. I did that." He looks up at the sky, victorious and content like an old cat. "We sold a lot of slippers that year..."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Alright, here we go -- Ms. Kapaleva..."
links.text: Alright, here we go -- Ms. Kapaleva (née Olga Grebennikova) was once known as East Revachol's premier vedette and sex symbol. Her role in director Do Do Chakan's sexploitation motion picture 'Psychotronic Stripper' launched her into stardom. She's been voted Most Captivating Woman by La Fayette *three years* running.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Three years, you hear that? Three y..."
links.text: Three years, you hear that? Three years... how hot did she have to be?!

links.title: Encyclopedia: "No, we don't?"
links.text: No, we don't?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "But why don't we remember that??!"
links.text: But why don't we remember that??!

links.title: Composure: "It's because it's not *cool* or *st..."
links.text: It's because it's not *cool* or *stylish*. It's lame and *out* -- even Ms. Kapaleva couldn't pull it off.

links.title: You: ""I need numbers -- years of service..."
links.text: "I need numbers -- years of service, P&L statements..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Numbers? How about fifteen fucking..."
links.text: "Numbers? How about fifteen fucking years of jamming *art* into people's heads? That's hundreds of high-concept ideas developed *and* executed for those fancy corp boys in their suits. The result?" He leans back, ready for his mic-drop...

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*Millions* of reál generated for c..."
links.text: "*Millions* of reál generated for clients. I've made my name in this world."

links.title: Volition: "And then he lost it all by going fo..."
links.text: And then he lost it all by going for a jog... not exactly *inspiring*.

links.title: You: ""I have reservations about your......"
links.text: "I have reservations about your... personal responsibility."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Tequila, Tequila... Whatever's goi..."
links.text: "Tequila, Tequila... Whatever's going on in my reality situation doesn't have any bearings on yours. This is all about *you* and *your* future. Ask me about *that*."

links.title: You: ""How does your drinking impact your..."
links.text: "How does your drinking impact your work performance?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Drinking is the fuel to my fire. M..."
links.text: "Drinking is the fuel to my fire. Moistens me up to ensure the high concepts have a smooth landing." He tries taking another sip from the bottle, but misses and pours some of its contents inside his collar.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Ah, shit...""
links.text: "Ah, shit..."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "He could definitely work more on hi..."
links.text: He could definitely work more on his Hand/Eye Coordination...

links.title: Empathy: "You should hire him and ask him to..."
links.text: You should hire him and ask him to stop drinking. Everyone deserves a second (or third) chance.

links.title: You: ""Alright, give me your best pitch.""
links.text: "Alright, give me your best pitch."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Okay, okay, let me get a sip first..."
links.text: "Okay, okay, let me get a sip first..." He manages to down half a bottle, then sits up straight, a hazy but oddly determined stare in his eyes. His finger shoots up.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You see, net worth means *nothing*..."
links.text: "You see, net worth means *nothing* to the people of Martinaise. Nada. Null. For them to see your wealth, to really *respect* that, you need to convert it into something real, something *tangible*. The bigger the better." He peers into his bottle for inspiration.

links.title: You: ""What are you talking about? I'm th..."
links.text: "What are you talking about? I'm the hottest shit in town. I'm as *real* as it gets."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""The horseback monument!" He snaps..."
links.text: "The horseback monument!" He snaps his fingers. "That's the centre of the district -- they'd *have* to pay attention to that. We could get your name up there in lights. Damn thing's due for a *re-conceptualization* anyway."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're aware that monument is *sup..."
links.text: "You're aware that monument is *supposed* to look like it's exploding? It doesn't need renovating."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I didn't say renovating, I said *r..."
links.text: "I didn't say renovating, I said *re-conceptualization*. It's medium-concept shit is what it is," he says, spitting out each word.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Hmm... the level of conceptualizati..."
links.text: Hmm... the level of conceptualization *could* always be higher, yes.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "But what would it cost?"
links.text: But what would it cost?

links.title: You: ""There's nothing more real than the..."
links.text: "There's nothing more real than the *End of Everything*."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, okay. Real like paying your..."
links.text: "Yeah, okay. Real like paying your bills or eating malt fibre in the morning."

links.title: You: ""To never even *grasp* the idea of..."
links.text: "To never even *grasp* the idea of economic nonentities... I feel sorry for them."

links.title: You: ""Yes, show them *real* art, then th..."
links.text: "Yes, show them *real* art, then they'll be able to appreciate the majesty of my finances."

links.title: You: ""How much is this going to cost me?""
links.text: "How much is this going to cost me?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Nothing up front. That's 'cause I..."
links.text: "Nothing up front. That's 'cause I always put the client first. My cut'll come out of the back-end, *after* we've made you a sensation...."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We really haven't got time for thi..."
links.text: "We really haven't got time for this," the lieutenant says, getting impatient. "In case you've forgotten, we're supposed to be investigating a murder."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""And forget about contractors and t..."
links.text: "And forget about contractors and the like. This job I'm handling *personally*, concept and execution," he continues. "Any unexpected expenses we'll take care of later. Can't let price compromise the work. Easy."

links.title: You: ""Okay, let's do it, you're hired!"..."
links.text: "Okay, let's do it, you're hired!" (Accept his offer.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's it, I'm *BACK*!" He takes a..."
links.text: "That's it, I'm *BACK*!" He takes a celebratory swig -- a *big* one. Too big. The brown liquid cascades down his face and floods his nostrils. Once he's finished choking he spits on the ground.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Sorry about that, my friend. This..."
links.text: "Sorry about that, my friend. This isn't about me, this is about *you*, of course. A chance for you to give back to the community. To get your brand out there. To teach them your *name*." He spreads his hands across the sky...

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I can already see it -- Tequila Su..."
links.text: "I can already see it -- Tequila Sunset -- spelled out in cathode rays. Luminous against the evening sky. There won't be a single kid in this town who doesn't know who you are."

links.title: Empathy: "This is a good moment to bring up h..."
links.text: This is a good moment to bring up his drinking... He'll get nothing done if he continues like that.

links.title: You: ""One more thing -- you're going to..."
links.text: "One more thing -- you're going to have to cut back on the booze."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Whoa there!" The man looks taken a..."
links.text: "Whoa there!" The man looks taken aback, hands high in the air. Tiny droplets of beer flicker in his beard like miniscule pearls.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Yeah, whoa there! What is this, the..."
links.text: Yeah, whoa there! What is this, the fun police?!

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No need to worry about *that*," he..."
links.text: "No need to worry about *that*," he says, his inebriated mouth twisting into odd shapes, "I've got it *all* under control. Besides, it helps with my creativity. Gets the business juices flowing, y'know?" He finishes it off with a wink.

links.title: You: ""If I can do it, so can you.""
links.text: "If I can do it, so can you."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I don't think *I* can do it. Sorry..."
links.text: "I don't think *I* can do it. Sorry." He stares at the bottle in his hand, then lets out a deep sigh...

links.title: Logic: "Some complex calculations are takin..."
links.text: Some complex calculations are taking place in that intoxicated mind of his...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Suddenly you feel sad, looking at t..."
links.text: Suddenly you feel sad, looking at this man and his bottle... somehow he looks *ancient*, these thoughts having chased him for years.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No, you're right. I've *got* to do..."
links.text: "No, you're right. I've *got* to do this. I *need* this." He pushes a balled fist into a thigh. "Alright, you know what, Tequila, you old rat? I'll consider your request."

links.title: You: ""Well, I guess if it helps with you..."
links.text: "Well, I guess if it helps with your work..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Exactly! I just know I wouldn't be..."
links.text: "Exactly! I just know I wouldn't be able to deliver the hot shit you're after without it." He has a quick swig from his bottle.

links.title: You: ""I know what you mean, I become a *..."
links.text: "I know what you mean, I become a *superpower* when I'm drunk."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Exactly! We're partners, you and I..."
links.text: "Exactly! We're partners, you and I -- partners in drinking, partners in business..." He chugs in celebration.

links.title: You: ""No, you have to stop drinking. I i..."
links.text: "No, you have to stop drinking. I insist."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No can do. Sorry." He stares at th..."
links.text: "No can do. Sorry." He stares at the bottle in his hand, then lets out a deep sigh...

links.title: You: ""Good, when can you start work?""
links.text: "Good, when can you start work?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Give me half an hour, my friend. I..."
links.text: "Give me half an hour, my friend. In fact," he raises his grubby finger again, "I demand you to *sit down here* and *not move* until I'm back. Open a beer, chat with your old pals..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant massages his temples..."
links.text: The lieutenant massages his temples and looks down at the ground.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "There is little time for this..."
links.text: There is little time for this...

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*Relax*. I see you both running ar..."
links.text: "*Relax*. I see you both running around like maniacs, just back and forth, back and forth. Gotta live a little, enjoy the day."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*Relax*. I see you both running ar..."
links.text: "*Relax*. I see you both running around like maniacs, just back and forth, back and forth. Gotta live a little, enjoy the day."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*Relax*. I see you both running ar..."
links.text: "*Relax*. I see you both running around like maniacs, just back and forth, back and forth. Gotta live a little, enjoy the sun."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He turns his swollen nose to face t..."
links.text: He turns his swollen nose to face the moon, cheeks ruddy from the biting wind.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*Relax*. I see you running around..."
links.text: "*Relax*. I see you running around like a maniac, just back and forth, back and forth. Gotta live a little, enjoy the day."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He turns his swollen face against t..."
links.text: He turns his swollen face against the wind, freezing rain battering his cheeks.

links.title: You: ""I don't think I have time to just..."
links.text: "I don't think I have time to just sit and wait..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No, Tequila, let me take care of i..."
links.text: "No, Tequila, let me take care of it."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "Before you know it the man has put..."
links.text: Before you know it the man has put down the bottle, stood up, and left. Minutes pass; the clouds change shape up in the sky...

links.title: Rosemary: "You chat a bit with old Rosemary..."
links.text: You chat a bit with old Rosemary...

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: "Then try to strike up a conversatio..."
links.text: Then try to strike up a conversation with Don't Call Abigail about something other than Abigail (to no avail)... It's all about Abigail.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sits silent the enti..."
links.text: The lieutenant sits silent the entire time, preferring to focus on his notebook.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Clearly we have better things to do..."
links.text: Clearly we have better things to do than sit down and chat with a bunch of drunks!

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "After what feels like ages, you hea..."
links.text: After what feels like ages, you hear the fence creaking as if under a large weight. Look at him. Just look at him.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "It's Idiot Doom Spiral -- he's *bac..."
links.text: It's Idiot Doom Spiral -- he's *back*. Like a beast made of jaundice and fetid polypropylene, he returns locked in stiff combat and with a most fearsome foe...

links.title: You: ""What are you doing?!""
links.text: "What are you doing?!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I know, I know. Ran into some prob..."
links.text: "I know, I know. Ran into some problems there -- material shortages and the like -- but don't worry, genius *thrives* under constraints!" He points at himself, proud and happy. "That's why you pay for the best..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Hmm, he seems even more drunk than..."
links.text: Hmm, he seems even more drunk than before...

links.title: Conceptualization: "What an athlete! There should be a..."
links.text: What an athlete! There should be a new word for drunk moves like that -- like alco-lete or gin-nast!

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "He can't even walk straight. How di..."
links.text: He can't even walk straight. How did he write your name in cathode rays?

links.title: You: ""You seem a bit drunk. You sure you..."
links.text: "You seem a bit drunk. You sure you're happy with your work?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Of course I am. When you're ready..."
links.text: "Of course I am. When you're ready -- and I don't think you ever will be..." He pauses to pick up his bottle.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Just head on over to the horseback..."
links.text: "Just head on over to the horseback monument. You'll see. World's gonna *know* -- about you, me, and the shiny numbers in our bank account."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant closes his notebook..."
links.text: The lieutenant closes his notebook and nods at you, ready to go.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""But if there's anything else your..."
links.text: "But if there's anything else your old friend can do for you, let me know." He takes a mouthful of beer, swishing it around in his mouth like some kind of sommelier.

links.title: You: ""Good, good. Can I go and take a lo..."
links.text: "Good, good. Can I go and take a look at the monument now?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yes, whenever you're ready -- and..."
links.text: "Yes, whenever you're ready -- and I don't think you ever will be..." He pauses to pick up his bottle.

links.title: You: ""All finished?""
links.text: "All finished?"

links.title: You: ""Here he is -- the man of the hour!""
links.text: "Here he is -- the man of the hour!"

links.title: You: ""We've pissed off the lieutenant!"..."
links.text: "We've pissed off the lieutenant!" (Look at Kim.)

links.title: You: ""Sure, sounds like a much-needed br..."
links.text: "Sure, sounds like a much-needed break from all the work."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Exactly! Just give me a minute or..."
links.text: "Exactly! Just give me a minute or two..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*Relax*. I see you running around..."
links.text: "*Relax*. I see you running around like a maniac, just back and forth, back and forth. Gotta live a little, enjoy the day."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He turns his swollen face against t..."
links.text: He turns his swollen face against the snow, droplets of beer freezing in his beard.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*Relax*. I see you running around..."
links.text: "*Relax*. I see you running around like a maniac, just back and forth, back and forth. Gotta live a little, enjoy the sun."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He turns his swollen nose to face t..."
links.text: He turns his swollen nose to face the sun, cheeks ruddy from the biting wind.

links.title: You: ""Let's come back to this later.""
links.text: "Let's come back to this later."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Sure, my man, let's circle back wh..."
links.text: "Sure, my man, let's circle back whenever you want." He hiccups. "Take your time. I'll be here."

links.title: You: ""Do you know any Personal Brand Str..."
links.text: "Do you know any Personal Brand Strategists? I need to start building my image." (Show him the certificate.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He scans the document and lets out..."
links.text: He scans the document and lets out a long, low whistle. "Things have really turned around for you, haven't they? You've got *big money* problems now." He looks back at you, eyes gleaming.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Don't be shy, Tequila. Of course I..."
links.text: "Don't be shy, Tequila. Of course I'll do it." He ploughs a thumb into his chest. "I'm your man."

links.title: You: ""What do you mean you're 'my man'?""
links.text: "What do you mean you're 'my man'?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Your Personal Brand Strategist man..."
links.text: "Your Personal Brand Strategist man. Now I know I'm not your 'typical' choice. I don't wear a suit, I'm not a hundred years old, I'm not about to die tomorrow..."

links.title: Endurance: "Not so sure about the last part, wi..."
links.text: Not so sure about the last part, with all that drinking...

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""But I've got something the others..."
links.text: "But I've got something the others don't. I'm on *your* level. And as I already understand *your* needs I can marry my high-concept ideas with your brand easily. I'll help you make your mark."

links.title: You: ""Sorry, I'm already taken." (Nod at..."
links.text: "Sorry, I'm already taken." (Nod at Kim.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant is about to say some..."
links.text: The lieutenant is about to say something, but gets cut off...

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Listen, I'm not about to come betw..."
links.text: "Listen, I'm not about to come between you two. I know my place, eh? I'll just be your Personal Brand Strategist man. Your high-concept idea generator. Yeah?"

links.title: Savoir Faire: "*Great* can-do attitude! A billion..."
links.text: *Great* can-do attitude! A billion reál mindset. Clinically *insane* energy! Hire him on the spot!!

links.title: You: ""That's it, you're *hired*!""
links.text: "That's it, you're *hired*!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No, Tequila, no..." He sighs heavi..."
links.text: "No, Tequila, no..." He sighs heavily. "I'm a *professional*, you see. I insist that you give me a formal interview. It wouldn't be fair on the other candidates if you didn't."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What do you need to know?" He lean..."
links.text: "What do you need to know?" He leans forward and takes another sip from his bottle, brows knitted together in mock seriousness.

links.title: Volition: "What you truly want to know is -- c..."
links.text: What you truly want to know is -- can you really trust your entire fortune to a drunk who lost his house keys while out for a jog?

links.title: Endurance: "Grill him a bit, see how he perform..."
links.text: Grill him a bit, see how he performs under pressure.

links.title: Volition: "He doesn't exactly come across as r..."
links.text: He doesn't exactly come across as responsible. Are you sure you can trust him with your *entire fortune*?

links.title: You: ""This voice in my head tells me to..."
links.text: "This voice in my head tells me to hire you, but I'm not so sure..."

links.title: You: ""No, you've misunderstood me -- I w..."
links.text: "No, you've misunderstood me -- I want you to *recommend* a Personal Brand Strategist, not become one."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Tequila, Tequila... You don't know..."
links.text: "Tequila, Tequila... You don't know what you're missing out on. Those other guys? They'll just steal your money while providing meagre service."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Now *me*, on the other hand? I onl..."
links.text: "Now *me*, on the other hand? I only provide *very* high-concept ideas. And as I already understand *your* needs I can marry them with your brand easily. I'll help you make your mark."

links.title: You: ""Have you seen a woman named Ruby a..."
links.text: "Have you seen a woman named Ruby around here lately?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Can't really remember seeing any w..."
links.text: "Can't really remember seeing any women after losing my keys."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "It's a touchy topic. He hasn't gott..."
links.text: It's a touchy topic. He hasn't gotten laid in *ages*.

links.title: Drama: "He really has no idea who this Ruby..."
links.text: He really has no idea who this Ruby is, sire.

links.title: You: ""What do you guys do around here?""
links.text: "What do you guys do around here?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""We are saving the world!" He looks..."
links.text: "We are saving the world!" He looks at his comrades.

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Please... please don't call... don..."
links.text: "Please... please don't call... don't call..." begs the man in the pipe.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Okay, we're drinking. We're drinki..."
links.text: "Okay, we're drinking. We're drinking alcohol -- that's what we're doing. I *tried* to save the world once, a long time ago, with enterprise, creativity and willpower, but that didn't work out."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""So now it's a pirate's life for me.""
links.text: "So now it's a pirate's life for me."

links.title: You: ""Could you and your pals sign this..."
links.text: "Could you and your pals sign this document?" (Show Evrart's letter.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What's it about?" He waves his han..."
links.text: "What's it about?" He waves his hand apathetically. "Ah, I'll let my hand address the situation."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Maybe you've heard? I used to be a..."
links.text: "Maybe you've heard? I used to be a very successful businessman. I've signed more than a few lease forms or whatever the fuck they were." He looks around. "Anyone got a pen? The pro's gonna do it."

links.title: You: ""I have this blue oblong pen." (Len..."
links.text: "I have this blue oblong pen." (Lend him your pen.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Alright!" He grabs the pen and pap..."
links.text: "Alright!" He grabs the pen and paper from your hands and, very carefully, scribbles on the dotted line, next to 'Lilienne Carter': 'Idiot Doom Spiral'.

links.title: You: ""Uh, can I have the pen back too?""
links.text: "Uh, can I have the pen back too?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Don't know if I've mentioned it, b..."
links.text: "Don't know if I've mentioned it, but I used to be a businessman and *as* a businessman I am going to keep the pen for my trouble." He nods confidently.

links.title: Interfacing: "Nooooo! That was my favourite thing..."
links.text: Nooooo! That was my favourite thing, of all the things you have. This had better be worth losing the pen for.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "My favourite is the gun."
links.text: My favourite is the gun.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "My favourite was the gun he lost."
links.text: My favourite was the gun he lost.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Don't know if I've mentioned it, b..."
links.text: "Don't know if I've mentioned it, but I used to be a businessman and *as* a businessman I am going to keep the pen for my trouble." He nods confidently.

links.title: You: ""You've done a great service to the..."
links.text: "You've done a great service to the community, to the RCM and to Revachol."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hey, guys -- I'm a hero!" He hands..."
links.text: "Hey, guys -- I'm a hero!" He hands you the envelope, and waves his hand erratically at his companions.

links.title: Rosemary: ""Hell yes!" The red-nosed drunk bri..."
links.text: "Hell yes!" The red-nosed drunk brings his hand up to his head for a salute.

links.title: You: ""That's it then. The deed is done.""
links.text: "That's it then. The deed is done."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Glad to have been of assistance!"..."
links.text: "Glad to have been of assistance!" He gives you a thumbs up, and the envelope also. "After all this time, I feel like I've made a difference..."

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: "The incapacitated drunk lays there..."
links.text: The incapacitated drunk lays there snoring like an ancient rusting tractor.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you for your help." He turns..."
links.text: "Thank you for your help." He turns to you. "Should we go and mail this? I think I saw a mailbox on the plaza."

links.title: You: ""I wanna ask these guys a couple of..."
links.text: "I wanna ask these guys a couple of things first."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Okay, what's on your mind?""
links.text: "Okay, what's on your mind?"

links.title: You: ""Mailbox, plaza -- got it! Bye!" [L..."
links.text: "Mailbox, plaza -- got it! Bye!" [Leave.]

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Anything else this merry band of a..."
links.text: "Anything else this merry band of adventurers can do for you, or do you need to go and mail that serious looking document of yours?" His face lightens up. "There's a mailbox on the plaza."

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't call Abigail!" The drunk in..."
links.text: "Don't call Abigail!" The drunk in the pipe snorts and takes a swig from his bottle. The bottle is empty.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Alright!" He grabs the pen and pap..."
links.text: "Alright!" He grabs the pen and paper and carefully, scribbles on the dotted line -- next to Lilienne's signature -- 'Idiot Doom Spiral'.

links.title: You: ""I need at least two signatures on..."
links.text: "I need at least two signatures on the document."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hey Abs!" He shouts to the non-res..."
links.text: "Hey Abs!" He shouts to the non-responsive drunk still dribbling drool from the side of his mouth.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""HEY ABS! ABS!" He grabs his passed..."
links.text: "HEY ABS! ABS!" He grabs his passed-out friend by the shoulder and shakes him a bit.

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: "The man mumbles incoherently."
links.text: The man mumbles incoherently.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hey! Goddamn *Abigail* is here, wa..."
links.text: "Hey! Goddamn *Abigail* is here, wake up! WAKE UP!" His efforts get no response.

links.title: You: ""I don't think he can help, he's co..."
links.text: "I don't think he can help, he's completely out of it."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I'll be damned... uh, well, uh......"
links.text: "I'll be damned... uh, well, uh... that's what we have Rosemary for!" He points to the third drunkard. "You can help, right?"

links.title: You: ""Maybe someone else can help?" (Poi..."
links.text: "Maybe someone else can help?" (Point to the third guy.)

links.title: Rosemary: "The jolly man looks at you, then hi..."
links.text: The jolly man looks at you, then his friend in the tracksuit. "Sure I can fuckin' help. You need a signature -- I *got* you a signature."

links.title: Rosemary: "Before you can reply he's already f..."
links.text: Before you can reply he's already furiously scribbling something on the paper. When he hands the document back to you, the signature -- in upper case letters -- reads: "DON'T CALL ABIGAIL."

links.title: Interfacing: "Not exactly an expert forgery. Don'..."
links.text: Not exactly an expert forgery. Don't Call Abigail would have signed something more like *Domwtclall Abheqoeel*.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hey Abs!" He shouts to the mumblin..."
links.text: "Hey Abs!" He shouts to the mumbling drunkard next to him. "HEY ABS!"

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: "The man looks around confused. "Don..."
links.text: The man looks around confused. "Don't... ya... ya call Abigail."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I need you to sign this document r..."
links.text: "I need you to sign this document right here." He waves the paper and pen in front of the man's face. "It's important."

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't call her..." His trembling h..."
links.text: "Don't call her..." His trembling hand catches the paperwork. He lays it out on his knee and starts writing, slowly. The handwriting is almost illegible due to his shaky hands.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*Domwtclall Abheqoeel*?" His frien..."
links.text: "*Domwtclall Abheqoeel*?" His friend grabs the document and admires it. "Great job, Abbs. Nailed it." He hands it back to you.

links.title: You: ""Uh, can I have the pen back too?""
links.text: "Uh, can I have the pen back too?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""Fuckin' cops, man, always hasslin'..."
links.text: "Fuckin' cops, man, always hasslin' the poor folk." He shakes his head. "You know what? I'm keepin' the pen and that's the end of it."

links.title: Interfacing: "Nooooo! That was my favourite thing..."
links.text: Nooooo! That was my favourite thing, of all the things you have.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "My favourite is the gun."
links.text: My favourite is the gun.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "My favourite is the gun he lost."
links.text: My favourite is the gun he lost.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Don't know if I've mentioned it, b..."
links.text: "Don't know if I've mentioned it, but I used to be a businessman and *as* a businessman I am going to keep the pen for my trouble." He nods confidently.

links.title: Rosemary: ""Fuckin' cops, man, always hasslin'..."
links.text: "Fuckin' cops, man, always hasslin' the poor folk." He shakes his head. "You know what? I'm keepin' the pen and that's the end of it."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Don't know if I've mentioned it, b..."
links.text: "Don't know if I've mentioned it, but I used to be a businessman and *as* a businessman I am going to keep the pen for my trouble." He nods confidently.

links.title: You: ""You've done a great service to the..."
links.text: "You've done a great service to the village, to the RCM, and to Revachol.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hey, guys -- we're heroes!" He wav..."
links.text: "Hey, guys -- we're heroes!" He waves his hand erratically to the other guys.

links.title: Rosemary: ""'Bout fuckin' time, man. I've done..."
links.text: "'Bout fuckin' time, man. I've done my duty." He brings his hand up to his head for a salute.

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: "The incapacitated drunk lays there..."
links.text: The incapacitated drunk lays there snoring like an ancient rusting tractor.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you for your services, gentl..."
links.text: "Thank you for your services, gentlemen." He turns to you. "Should we go and mail this? I think I saw a mailbox on the plaza."

links.title: You: ""A few more questions first.""
links.text: "A few more questions first."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Okay, what's on your mind?""
links.text: "Okay, what's on your mind?"

links.title: You: ""Mailbox... plaza... got it!" [Leav..."
links.text: "Mailbox... plaza... got it!" [Leave.]

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Anything else this merry band of a..."
links.text: "Anything else this merry band of adventurers can do for you, or do you need to go and mail that serious looking document of yours?" His face lightens up. "I think I saw a mailbox near the plaza."

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't call Abigail!" He snorts and..."
links.text: "Don't call Abigail!" He snorts and takes a swig from his bottle. The bottle is empty.

links.title: You: ""Uh, I guess that's it.""
links.text: "Uh, I guess that's it."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Glad to have been of assistance!"..."
links.text: "Glad to have been of assistance!" He gives you a thumbs up. "After all this time, I feel like I've made a difference..."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Feels like a... like a thousand fu..."
links.text: "Feels like a... like a thousand fuckin' reál, man. Doing *good*."

links.title: You: ""Thanks.""
links.text: "Thanks."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No problem!" He looks around for a..."
links.text: "No problem!" He looks around for a bottle. "Now where'd I put that..."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Fuckin' 'ard work done for the day..."
links.text: "Fuckin' 'ard work done for the day, man."

links.title: You: ""Yes, I have this green ape one." (..."
links.text: "Yes, I have this green ape one." (Lend him your pen.)

links.title: You: ""No, unfortunately.""
links.text: "No, unfortunately."

links.title: Rosemary: ""I got a freebie, when I purchased..."
links.text: "I got a freebie, when I purchased a whole carton of cigarettes." He produces a white pen with brown logos. "Smoke cigarettes, get a free pen. Deals don't come any sweeter."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "The writing under the tiny crown lo..."
links.text: The writing under the tiny crown logo reads *Royal Extra*.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Thanks, Rosie." He grabs the pen a..."
links.text: "Thanks, Rosie." He grabs the pen and paper and carefully, scribbles on the dotted line -- next to Lilienne's signature -- 'Idiot Doom Spiral'.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Thanks, Rosie." He grabs the pen a..."
links.text: "Thanks, Rosie." He grabs the pen and paper from your hands and, very carefully, scribbles on the dotted line: 'Idiot Doom Spiral'.

links.title: You: ""Why do you keep losing all your st..."
links.text: "Why do you keep losing all your stuff?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Good fucking question, Tequila! If..."
links.text: "Good fucking question, Tequila! If I knew the answer, you think I'd be hanging out on a beach in this formerly premium but now extremely dirty two-piece Lickra(TM) tracksuit?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I used to own my reality situation..."
links.text: "I used to own my reality situation. My business buddies and I had our own creative services agency. I had a nice apartment, an even nicer piece of ass, but somehow it all got away from me..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Now the only things I haven't lost..."
links.text: "Now the only things I haven't lost are these two drunks."

links.title: You: ""What was the name of your agency?""
links.text: "What was the name of your agency?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""My agency, man..." He takes a long..."
links.text: "My agency, man..." He takes a long, melancholic sip. "The Boom Boom Room. Our concept was combining high art with the lowest forms of marketing -- the colour red, breasts, and oil painting..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I convinced my partners to reinves..."
links.text: "I convinced my partners to reinvest some of our profits in an even-more high-concept 'cultural incubator' called 'Thin Air'. The artists were happy, the clients were happy."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I was financing a group of poets i..."
links.text: "I was financing a group of poets in East Revachol who were developing a new, universal poetic language... but then it all went to shit..." He looks toward the bay.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Sounds intriguing. What say you, ar..."
links.text: Sounds intriguing. What say you, art cop?

links.title: Logic: "If it sounds like it makes no sense..."
links.text: If it sounds like it makes no sense, that's because it doesn't.

links.title: You: ""The female isn't yours to objectif..."
links.text: "The female isn't yours to objectify, not in art nor anywhere else!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's rich coming from you, Tequi..."
links.text: "That's rich coming from you, Tequila. You had some pretty wild views about women last weekend..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know where he picked up th..."
links.text: "I don't know where he picked up these views, but wherever it was, he seems to be sincere about them."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Anyway, that's not the point. The..."
links.text: "Anyway, that's not the point. The point is that mixing art and sex can make you fucking *rich*.

links.title: You: ""Mixing oil painting and breasts to..."
links.text: "Mixing oil painting and breasts to make ads isn't high art, it's just cynical wankery."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Well, you know, sex sells. That's..."
links.text: "Well, you know, sex sells. That's the first rule of advertising."

links.title: You: ""Maybe, but it's still tired.""
links.text: "Maybe, but it's still tired."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Maybe you're right, who knows? May..."
links.text: "Maybe you're right, who knows? Maybe we were behind the curve? We were fucking *rich*, though, that much I know..."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, actually -- you're right. Le..."
links.text: "Yeah, actually -- you're right. Let the market sort it out. No need for me to regulate this stuff."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's what's so cool about advert..."
links.text: "That's what's so cool about advertising -- It's kind of like art, except you can also get fucking *rich* doing it..."

links.title: You: ""That's so high-concept I have no i..."
links.text: "That's so high-concept I have no idea what it means."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I *know*..." He takes a long, wist..."
links.text: "I *know*..." He takes a long, wistful sip of his pilsner. "It was fucking awesome. And now it's all gone."

links.title: You: ""Man, mixing high and low, commodif..."
links.text: "Man, mixing high and low, commodifying culture, that is extremely my shit."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yes, Tequila, yes!" He punches you..."
links.text: "Yes, Tequila, yes!" He punches you on the shoulder. "That was what we were all *about*... now it's all gone, of course."

links.title: You: ""Right, okay. Never mind that I ask..."
links.text: "Right, okay. Never mind that I asked."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He taps against his head. "Askin' i..."
links.text: He taps against his head. "Askin' is how you get ahead."

links.title: You: ""What's up with the tracksuit?""
links.text: "What's up with the tracksuit?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What? You never seen 100% Lickra(T..."
links.text: "What? You never seen 100% Lickra(TM) before? Go on, feel that primo material." The man extends his arm...

links.title: Half Light: "You really shouldn't touch it."
links.text: You really shouldn't touch it.

links.title: You: ""I'll just admire it from afar, tha..."
links.text: "I'll just admire it from afar, thanks."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That might be the right idea. This..."
links.text: "That might be the right idea. This here is one of the last of its kind. Should probably be in a museum, honestly." He takes another sip. "Can't get it anymore. It was too primo even for Graad."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "By 'primo' he means 'possibly carci..."
links.text: By 'primo' he means 'possibly carcinogenic'. Lickra(TM) was a synthetic fabric developed by  manufacturers in the middle '40s, notable mainly for the swishy sound it makes as the wearer passes by...

links.title: Encyclopedia: "It's also known to become extremely..."
links.text: It's also known to become extremely itchy if not properly cared for.

links.title: Rosemary: ""Wow, you're lucky. He never lets m..."
links.text: "Wow, you're lucky. He never lets me feel it."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's because your paws are fucki..."
links.text: "That's because your paws are fucking filthy, Rosemary! We're right next to the bay, you could wash them anytime."

links.title: You: "Touch it."
links.text: Touch it.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Pretty nice, huh? This might be on..."
links.text: "Pretty nice, huh? This might be one of the last of its kind. Should probably be in a museum, honestly." He takes another sip.

links.title: Interfacing: "Good god, it's nearly impossible to..."
links.text: Good god, it's nearly impossible to describe how dirty this texture is. It's like rubbing two jellyfish skins together. You feel about 15% less human for having touched it.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Randomized trials have also found L..."
links.text: Randomized trials have also found Lickra(TM) to be associated with a number of exotic, highly malignant cancers. So you also have that to look forward to.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "And then there's the smell, but you..."
links.text: And then there's the smell, but you don't even want to think about that.

links.title: Rosemary: ""Wow, you're lucky. He never lets m..."
links.text: "Wow, you're lucky. He never lets me feel it."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's because your paws are fucki..."
links.text: "That's because your paws are fucking filthy, Rosie! We're right next to the bay, you could wash them anytime."

links.title: You: ""What about the other drunks?""
links.text: "What about the other drunks?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""My fellow members of the Union of..."
links.text: "My fellow members of the Union of Moribund Alcoholics? They're exactly what they look like."

links.title: Rosemary: ""'Ey! Tequila! You wanna buy some s..."
links.text: "'Ey! Tequila! You wanna buy some speed?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Shut the fuck up, Rosemary! He's a..."
links.text: "Shut the fuck up, Rosemary! He's a cop, remember?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""I thought he was a cool cop.""
links.text: "I thought he was a cool cop."

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: "A gurgling sound comes from the dir..."
links.text: A gurgling sound comes from the direction of the non-responsive man.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""And yeah, you're already acquainte..."
links.text: "And yeah, you're already acquainted with Abs." He points to the man in the pipe. "So yeah, that's basically us. We drink together."

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't call Abigail!""
links.text: "Don't call Abigail!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""And this is Abs." He points to the..."
links.text: "And this is Abs." He points to the man in the pipe. "So yeah, that's basically us. We drink together."

links.title: You: ""What's this about a lost jacket?""
links.text: "What's this about a lost jacket?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Tequila, it's a verifiable tragedy..."
links.text: "Tequila, it's a verifiable tragedy. It was practically brand new. Sure, it didn't really go with my Lickra(TM) threads, but it did itch a lot less..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Say, you're a detective, right?" H..."
links.text: "Say, you're a detective, right?" He looks at you, bleary-eyed. "Maybe you can help ol' Doom Spiral out... solve the case of the missing jacket! What do you say, Tequila?"

links.title: You: "“You mean *this* jacket that I disc..."
links.text: “You mean *this* jacket that I discovered on the boardwalk and had cleaned on a whim?”

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hmmm." The man examines the jacket..."
links.text: "Hmmm." The man examines the jacket for a moment, a look of consternation on his brow...

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Nah, this isn't it. 'FALN'? That's..."
links.text: "Nah, this isn't it. 'FALN'? That's medium-concept stuff. Totally not my style."

links.title: You: ""So you're saying there's *another*..."
links.text: "So you're saying there's *another* lost jacket out there somewhere?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It's a big world out there, Tequil..."
links.text: "It's a big world out there, Tequila. Lotta lost jackets in it. Don't know why you'd think this could possibly be mine..."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Ey, Doom Spiral! Ain't that the ja..."
links.text: "Ey, Doom Spiral! Ain't that the jacket you stole the other week?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Not on your fucking life, Rosemary..."
links.text: "Not on your fucking life, Rosemary! What's wrong with you people? Like I'd be caught dead wearing 'FALN' like some low-concept bicycle courier..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Tell you what, Tequila: Why don't..."
links.text: "Tell you what, Tequila: Why don't *you* just hang onto that one. I'll get another jacket, some day..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""At least you got a nice jacket for..."
links.text: "At least you got a nice jacket for your troubles." The lieutenant shrugs.

links.title: You: ""C'mon, man, this *is* your jacket...."
links.text: "C'mon, man, this *is* your jacket. You just don't remember it."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No fucking way. Idiot Doom Spiral..."
links.text: "No fucking way. Idiot Doom Spiral never forgets a piece of premium menswear..."

links.title: You: ""I already found a filthy jacket ne..."
links.text: "I already found a filthy jacket near the boardwalk."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Holy shit! Tequila, how did you? N..."
links.text: "Holy shit! Tequila, how did you? Never mind -- I don't care, just let me see the jacket."

links.title: You: ""Wait. You're asking a police offic..."
links.text: "Wait. You're asking a police officer to help find a jacket you stole and then lost?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, exactly. You're here to serv..."
links.text: "Yeah, exactly. You're here to serve, right?"

links.title: You: ""Okay, sure. Where'd you lose it?""
links.text: "Okay, sure. Where'd you lose it?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""If I knew where I lost it don't yo..."
links.text: "If I knew where I lost it don't you think I'd have it? I mean -- maybe I was up by the boardwalk? Or walking along the beach? Or checking out the abandoned fish market?"

links.title: You: ""That's a lot of places.""
links.text: "That's a lot of places."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Somewhere north of here, that's fo..."
links.text: "Somewhere north of here, that's for sure. You could ask around, see if anyone's seen it."

links.title: You: ""I don't have time for this.""
links.text: "I don't have time for this."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Man, I thought you said you were a..."
links.text: "Man, I thought you said you were a cool cop."

links.title: You: ""Let me ask you something else." (C..."
links.text: "Let me ask you something else." (Conclude.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I'm all ears, Tequila.""
links.text: "I'm all ears, Tequila."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Now I can't hang onto anything. Ju..."
links.text: "Now I can't hang onto anything. Just last week I stole this nice new jacket, but then I lost it, too. The only things I haven't lost are these two drunks."

links.title: Empathy: "You of all people should empathize..."
links.text: You of all people should empathize with this. Perhaps this lost jacket is something you could help with...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "A lost jacket? Sounds like a myster..."
links.text: A lost jacket? Sounds like a mystery you could look into...

links.title: You: ""I changed my mind. I'll help you f..."
links.text: "I changed my mind. I'll help you find your missing jacket."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Excellent." He rubs his hands toge..."
links.text: "Excellent." He rubs his hands together. "When can you get started? The sooner I get that jacket back, the sooner I can get my life back together."

links.title: You: ""Any idea where you last had it?""
links.text: "Any idea where you last had it?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""If I knew where I lost it don't yo..."
links.text: "If I knew where I lost it don't you think I'd have it? Come on, man!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That said, I think maybe I was up..."
links.text: "That said, I think maybe I was up by the boardwalk? Or walking along the beach? Or checking out the abandoned fish market?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Somewhere north of here, that's fo..."
links.text: "Somewhere north of here, that's for sure. You could ask around, see if anyone's seen it."

links.title: You: ""I'll start right away.""
links.text: "I'll start right away."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You're a god damn hero, Tequila!"..."
links.text: "You're a god damn hero, Tequila!" He raises his bottle in salute, then takes a gigantic swig.

links.title: You: ""Okay, here's your jacket. Fresh wa..."
links.text: "Okay, here's your jacket. Fresh washed!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""My jacket?""
links.text: "My jacket?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, the one you had me clean the..."
links.text: "Yeah, the one you had me clean the seagull shit off of."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "A look of consternation crosses the..."
links.text: A look of consternation crosses the man's face. He looks at you, then at his bottle, then back at you...

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What the fuck are you talking abou..."
links.text: "What the fuck are you talking about, Tequila?"

links.title: You: ""What the fuck are *you* talking ab..."
links.text: "What the fuck are *you* talking about?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Rosemary, what the fuck is Tequila..."
links.text: "Rosemary, what the fuck is Tequila talking about?"

links.title: Rosemary: ""Aye, that's the jacket you stole t..."
links.text: "Aye, that's the jacket you stole two weeks ago. From the kid who was making it with his gal on the beach."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's disgusting. I've never done..."
links.text: "That's disgusting. I've never done anything like that in my life. You're both delusional." He scoffs. "'FALN'? That's medium-concept stuff."

links.title: You: ""So you're saying this *isn't* your..."
links.text: "So you're saying this *isn't* your jacket?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""'FALN'? That's medium-concept stuf..."
links.text: "'FALN'? That's medium-concept stuff. Not my style at all... I can't believe I'm saying this, but maybe you should lay off the booze -- It's fucking with your head."

links.title: Logic: "It becomes abundantly clear to you..."
links.text: It becomes abundantly clear to you how this man managed to lose his keys, business, friends and girlfriend.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "I'm calling it -- it's neurological..."
links.text: I'm calling it -- it's neurological.

links.title: You: ""Your loss. I'm keeping the jacket..."
links.text: "Your loss. I'm keeping the jacket for myself." (Keep it.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That shit is so medium-concept I w..."
links.text: "That shit is so medium-concept I wouldn't touch it with a stick. But yeah, okay, I'm sure it looks great on you."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's an okay jacket." The lieutena..."
links.text: "It's an okay jacket." The lieutenant shrugs. "If you're into that look."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That shit is so medium-concept I w..."
links.text: "That shit is so medium-concept I wouldn't touch it with a stick. But yeah, okay, I'm sure it looks great on you."

links.title: You: ""I went through a lot of trouble to..."
links.text: "I went through a lot of trouble to get this for you. Take the fucking jacket." (Give it to him.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You know what? Fine. Maybe I can p..."
links.text: "You know what? Fine. Maybe I can pawn it for some booze."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Aye, good thinking.""
links.text: "Aye, good thinking."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, it was pretty filthy, though..."
links.text: "Yeah, it was pretty filthy, though, so I got it cleaned for you."

links.title: You: ""I found your jacket.""
links.text: "I found your jacket."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Ah, Tequila, I *knew* you'd come t..."
links.text: "Ah, Tequila, I *knew* you'd come through. That's fucking great, man!"

links.title: You: "(Give him the jacket.)"
links.text: (Give him the jacket.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Let me see. What? This isn't my ja..."
links.text: "Let me see. What? This isn't my jacket. My jacket was beautiful. This is fucking filthy! What am I supposed to do with this?"

links.title: You: ""Look, I just stumbled upon *anothe..."
