links.text: "Look, I just stumbled upon *another* dead body. I don't care about the jacket."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I'm not taking a disgusting pile o..."
links.text: "I'm not taking a disgusting pile of hobo rags. I may be in an irrecoverably decaying orbit, but I've still got standards..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Either bring it back the way it wa..."
links.text: "Either bring it back the way it was before, or find a dumpster to burn it in." He hands it to you.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant inspects the jacket..."
links.text: The lieutenant inspects the jacket in your hands. "You know, despite the *guano* it looks like the jacket itself is stain-resistant. It may just need a good scrubbing."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Underneath the accumulated filth th..."
links.text: Underneath the accumulated filth the jacket itself appears to be stain-resistant. Maybe it just needs a good scrubbing?

links.title: You: ""What do you expect? You left it ou..."
links.text: "What do you expect? You left it outside for a week!"

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry. I found it like this.""
links.text: "I'm sorry. I found it like this."

links.title: You: ""I found a little more than I barga..."
links.text: "I found a little more than I bargained for."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What's that supposed to mean?""
links.text: "What's that supposed to mean?"

links.title: You: ""Nothing." (Give him the jacket.)"
links.text: "Nothing." (Give him the jacket.)

links.title: You: ""There was a dead body nearby.""
links.text: "There was a dead body nearby."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What's that got to do with my jack..."
links.text: "What's that got to do with my jacket?"

links.title: You: ""Probably nothing. Forget about it...."
links.text: "Probably nothing. Forget about it." (Give him the jacket.)

links.title: You: ""It's a pretty freaky coincidence.""
links.text: "It's a pretty freaky coincidence."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What do I care about some local st..."
links.text: "What do I care about some local stiff? You gonna give me the jacket or no?"

links.title: You: ""Fine, take the stupid thing." (Giv..."
links.text: "Fine, take the stupid thing." (Give him the jacket.)

links.title: You: ""So, uh -- can you tell me the Tequ..."
links.text: "So, uh -- can you tell me the Tequila Sunset story now?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Didn't I already say, I don't wann..."
links.text: "Didn't I already say, I don't wanna be the one who breaks it to you? You have to get acquainted with *the event* first! It'd be irresponsible..." The man shakes his head. His gray eyes look into yours.

links.title: Half Light: "...and also scary to tell you."
links.text: ...and also scary to tell you.

links.title: Volition: "You need to face up to it. Go to th..."
links.text: You need to face up to it. Go to the sea, inspect the machine.

links.title: You: ""Idiot Doom Spiral... I am ready no..."
links.text: "Idiot Doom Spiral... I am ready now. I've seen it. Tell me the story of Tequila Sunset."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Mhm. Let me take a sip to moisten..."
links.text: "Mhm. Let me take a sip to moisten up my cords..." He takes a big sip, then begins: "Tequila Sunset rolled into Martinaise last Friday. And by *Tequila Sunset* I mean *you* -- the man, the myth."

links.title: You: ""Wait, did we meet on Friday?""
links.text: "Wait, did we meet on Friday?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hey, let's not jump ahead of ourse..."
links.text: "Hey, let's not jump ahead of ourselves, this is *your* story. Stop interrupting." He takes another sip -- then continues.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You got here on Friday to solve a..."
links.text: "You got here on Friday to solve a case, hoping to be the early bird who gets the worm. And by 'the worm' I mean 'the buzz', because as far as I know, all you did was get piss-drunk..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Word on the street is you went aro..."
links.text: "Word on the street is you went around the local hostel telling people that you're a police officer and that it would be *really* fucked up if you shot yourself in the head right in front of them. That's pretty high concept, if you ask me."

links.title: Conceptualization: "It is."
links.text: It is.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Oh yeah, that's totally your style...."
links.text: Oh yeah, that's totally your style...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's brow is furrowed...."
links.text: The lieutenant's brow is furrowed. He's listening as casually as he can.

links.title: You: ""What, like you've *never* threaten..."
links.text: "What, like you've *never* threatened to paint the wall with your brains in front of some strangers?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hey man, I'm not judging." He wave..."
links.text: "Hey man, I'm not judging." He waves the bottle towards you. "This life's a valley of woes. Some of the highest-concept people in history have killed themselves -- *and* been drunks."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Either way, it was a late Saturday..."
links.text: "Either way, it was a late Saturday night, when we, the Union of Moribund Alcoholics, got our drink on. Nothing remarkable about this, we get our drink on 24/7. Makes everything warm and glowy, I trust you know the feeling."

links.title: You: ""Please, continue.""
links.text: "Please, continue."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It was a late Saturday night, when..."
links.text: "It was a late Saturday night, when we, the Union of Moribund Alcoholics, were getting our drink on. Nothing remarkable about this, we get our drink on 24/7. Makes everything warm and glowy, I trust you know the feeling."

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Oh yes, you do, *bratushka*. The on..."
links.text: Oh yes, you do, *bratushka*. The only thing better than that is pushing the pedal to the metal after you kiss the tie. And off we go...

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""One moment we hear the sound of a..."
links.text: "One moment we hear the sound of a motor carriage revving up somewhere on the plaza, followed by a series of dings and bangs."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Do you remember the sound of wood c..."
links.text: Do you remember the sound of wood cracking? The billboard...

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Naturally, loud noises pique the i..."
links.text: "Naturally, loud noises pique the interest of anybody owning a pair of ears. That's just the reality we're in."

links.title: You: ""Naturally.""
links.text: "Naturally."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Anyway, there was a brief silence..."
links.text: "Anyway, there was a brief silence -- a *gasp* of silence, if you will -- followed by a real commotion. We heard the carriage careening towards the coast at top speed."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Sounded like someone jumped the ca..."
links.text: "Sounded like someone jumped the canal. We grabbed our brewskies and rushed to the jetty -- never underestimate the speed of an alcoholic..."

links.title: Shivers: "Three men are standing on a wooden..."
links.text: Three men are standing on a wooden platform extending out from the shore of a dilapidated fishing village, their cheeks red, spirits high, beers in hand, eyes glazed over.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What we saw was a sight to behold...."
links.text: "What we saw was a sight to behold. A beat up police carriage, containing you. Right there on the beach. You revved the engine and screamed at the top of your lungs..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""'THE TIME HATH COME.'""
links.text: "'THE TIME HATH COME.'"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""So, naturally, being the curious c..."
links.text: "So, naturally, being the curious cat I am, I asked what time hath come, to which you replied..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""THE TIME HATH COME FOR TEQUILA SUN..."
links.text: "THE TIME HATH COME FOR TEQUILA SUNSET. THE END OF ALL THINGS."

links.title: You: ""Oh god. What happened next?""
links.text: "Oh god. What happened next?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Your reality contracted -- you jam..."
links.text: "Your reality contracted -- you jammed the pedal, ploughed right off the jetty and through the ice."

links.title: Interfacing: "The muscles in your right leg tense..."
links.text: The muscles in your right leg tense up.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Your hands cramp on the steering le..."
links.text: Your hands cramp on the steering levers.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""We ran towards the ice, whilst you..."
links.text: "We ran towards the ice, whilst you crawled your way out, miraculously unhurt -- covered in seaweed and shit. Like some kind of sea monster."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""When we finally got there you were..."
links.text: "When we finally got there you were sitting on the beach, crying. You said that your badge and uniform were in the car. It was too late to get in there though, the carriage had sunk too deep."

links.title: Rhetoric: "In this way, you and your motor car..."
links.text: In this way, you and your motor carriage have a lot in common.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Recognizing a brother in need, we..."
links.text: "Recognizing a brother in need, we offered our condolences and invited you to party with us, which you naturally agreed to..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "What else was there to do? Thank yo..."
links.text: What else was there to do? Thank you brothers, for your helping hand.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""We asked about the whole Tequila S..."
links.text: "We asked about the whole Tequila Sunset thing, and you told us it was your name now and insisted that we all call you that from then on."

links.title: You: ""Wait, so is Tequila Sunset an even..."
links.text: "Wait, so is Tequila Sunset an event or a name?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I think you said that *you* were t..."
links.text: "I think you said that *you* were the event, and that you would smash the looms of reality. Yeah... I knew I'd heard that looms line before."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I'm not sure. I think *you* were t..."
links.text: "I'm not sure. I think *you* were the event. Tequila Sunset. You know, as opposed to a Tequila Sunrise, which is *long gone*."

links.title: You: ""Tequila Sunset, huh? Sounds pretty..."
links.text: "Tequila Sunset, huh? Sounds pretty good."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, I agree." He smiles."
links.text: "Yeah, I agree." He smiles.

links.title: You: ""How long did we party for?""
links.text: "How long did we party for?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hours. It was an all-night drink-a..."
links.text: "Hours. It was an all-night drink-a-thon. Then at some point -- I think it was Sunday morning -- you got belligerent and wanted to talk about *Revacholian women*."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""How they're beautiful and also who..."
links.text: "How they're beautiful and also whores and so on. How one of them fucked you real bad. After a short while you crossed the event horizon, looked sullen, got up, and left without saying anything."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wow. That's *quite* a story.""
links.text: "Wow. That's *quite* a story."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, I bet Tequila's a fucking *l..."
links.text: "Yeah, I bet Tequila's a fucking *legend* around the precinct. You must be proud to work with him."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you only knew.""
links.text: "If you only knew."

links.title: You: ""Did I tell you anything specific a..."
links.text: "Did I tell you anything specific about this person that 'fucked me'?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You were pretty vague about it, bu..."
links.text: "You were pretty vague about it, but you kept saying you got fucked *real hard* and that we've all been fucked too..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Please, don't open that door."
links.text: Please, don't open that door.

links.title: Rosemary: ""No one's fucked me. *I* do the fuc..."
links.text: "No one's fucked me. *I* do the fucking around here."

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Abigail...""
links.text: "Abigail..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It seemed pretty painful, to be ho..."
links.text: "It seemed pretty painful, to be honest with you. If I had to guess, I'd say you're still working through some shit."

links.title: You: ""Did I mention losing anything else?""
links.text: "Did I mention losing anything else?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Beside your gun and your badge? Yo..."
links.text: "Beside your gun and your badge? You said something about your hope, or heart, or something. To be honest the details are a little hazy..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""In retrospect, I guess you lost yo..."
links.text: "In retrospect, I guess you lost your motor carriage, too. That's a big one."

links.title: You: ""Did I say anything about my collea..."
links.text: "Did I say anything about my colleagues?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You told us that they were a bunch..."
links.text: "You told us that they were a bunch of fucking losers whose main interest was 'cramping your style'..."

links.title: Empathy: "It's more like you were cramping th..."
links.text: It's more like you were cramping theirs.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No specifics, though. It was more..."
links.text: "No specifics, though. It was more about *you* that night. You were the star of the show."

links.title: You: ""Did I say anything about the case?""
links.text: "Did I say anything about the case?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, you said it was 'no biggie'..."
links.text: "Yeah, you said it was 'no biggie' and that you'd solve it in no time." He takes a strong quaff of his beer. "And that you didn't need *anyone* to do it. You're doin' it *solo* now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A lot of cops go *solo* and *hermi..."
links.text: "A lot of cops go *solo* and *hermit* once they reach that level of alcoholism."

links.title: Empathy: "It's not meant as a joke. He's sorr..."
links.text: It's not meant as a joke. He's sorry for the Hermit Cop.

links.title: You: ""Did we talk about, uhm, politics?""
links.text: "Did we talk about, uhm, politics?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, you seemed really mad about..."
links.text: "Yeah, you seemed really mad about immigrants for some reason..." He rubs the back of his neck.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I'd rather not get into the detail..."
links.text: "I'd rather not get into the details. It was pretty low-concept."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, you kept talking about how t..."
links.text: "Yeah, you kept talking about how the *coal mine owners* were fucking us all over just like that woman fucked you..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I didn't agree with you, by the wa..."
links.text: "I didn't agree with you, by the way. The spectral hand of the market makes sure everyone gets exactly what they deserve." He takes a long sip of beer.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, you said that it was okay th..."
links.text: "Yeah, you said that it was okay that you crashed your carriage because the spectral hand of the market was guiding you..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""This was before you started talkin..."
links.text: "This was before you started talking about how the pinkies were always trying to fuck you."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, you said that you'd really b..."
links.text: "Yeah, you said that you'd really behaved unreasonably and failed to uphold your responsibilities as a representative of the Coalition."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No, not really... you talked a lot..."
links.text: "No, not really... you talked a lot about some sad churches and how everyone's just out to fuck you."

links.title: You: ""Did you get a read on what kind of..."
links.text: "Did you get a read on what kind of cop I was?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You kept calling yourself a 'godda..."
links.text: "You kept calling yourself a 'goddamn superstar' who'd cleared '501 cases'..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "As you've already determined, the a..."
links.text: As you've already determined, the actual number is 216 -- but what's a little embellishment between friends?

links.title: Rhetoric: "As you've already determined, the a..."
links.text: As you've already determined, the actual number is just over 200 -- but what's a little embellishment between friends?

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""'No thanks to the squares at the p..."
links.text: "'No thanks to the squares at the precinct', as you put it."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You kept apologizing for being suc..."
links.text: "You kept apologizing for being such a bad cop and for the damage you've inflicted on everyone around you..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You also kept pausing to knock the..."
links.text: "You also kept pausing to knock the heel of your hand against your temples, saying 'Stupid, stupid, stupid.'"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You kept telling us that in your w..."
links.text: "You kept telling us that in your work you've seen a lot of blood but that it's nothing compared to the 'Great Bloodletting' to come..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I believe you mentioned something..."
links.text: "I believe you mentioned something about the ground cracking open to swallow cities and dreams alike. Yeah... I remember that *simile* or whatever the fuck they are."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You said being a cop was real bori..."
links.text: "You said being a cop was real boring and that there was no reason to talk about it." He shrugs.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You also kept pausing to knock the..."
links.text: "You also kept pausing to knock the heel of your hand against your temples, saying 'Boring, boring, boring.'"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Mostly you kept shouting 'I am The..."
links.text: "Mostly you kept shouting 'I am The Law' and talking about how you were going to bring the law to all lawless places with your law jaw."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Nothing much, you didn't want to t..."
links.text: "Nothing much, you didn't want to talk about it. You just kept mumbling inaudibly to yourself."

links.title: You: ""I don't need to hear any more." (C..."
links.text: "I don't need to hear any more." (Conclude.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It's a hard thing for a man to con..."
links.text: "It's a hard thing for a man to confront his past." He nods. "That's why I avoid mine at all costs."

links.title: You: ""Now *that's* a story.""
links.text: "Now *that's* a story."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It was the greatest thing this fis..."
links.text: "It was the greatest thing this fishing village has seen since Rosemary tried to use a crab to open his beer."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Aye, that were a classic, too.""
links.text: "Aye, that were a classic, too."

links.title: You: ""Are you sure it happened like that?""
links.text: "Are you sure it happened like that?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Trust me, Tequila. It happened. Ju..."
links.text: "Trust me, Tequila. It happened. Just ask one of these other witnesses."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Aye, every word he says is true.""
links.text: "Aye, every word he says is true."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""See?""
links.text: "See?"

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't call Abigail! Don't call!""
links.text: "Don't call Abigail! Don't call!"

links.title: You: ""That's not my name. I'm Raphaël Am..."
links.text: "That's not my name. I'm Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau. That's what you should call me."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Nah, that name sucks. You're Tequi..."
links.text: "Nah, that name sucks. You're Tequila Sunset. Just embrace it, brother."

links.title: You: ""My real name is Harry.""
links.text: "My real name is Harry."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No, that's just what your mother c..."
links.text: "No, that's just what your mother called you. Your real name is Tequila Sunset. Just embrace it, brother."

links.title: You: "Say nothing. It's more dignified th..."
links.text: Say nothing. It's more dignified that way.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""After which your reality contracte..."
links.text: "After which your reality contracted -- you jammed the pedal, ploughed right off the jetty and through the ice."

links.title: You: ""Every word I said was true. Tequil..."
links.text: "Every word I said was true. Tequila Sunset will break the looms of reality."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah -- looms. Why not? Then you j..."
links.text: "Yeah -- looms. Why not? Then you jammed the pedal and ploughed right off the jetty and through the ice."

links.title: You: ""Uhm.. I want to get off this story..."
links.text: "Uhm.. I want to get off this story-train right now."

links.title: Authority: "You can't get off now."
links.text: You can't get off now.

links.title: Volition: "You have to stay."
links.text: You have to stay.

links.title: Inland Empire: "The throttle is jammed and the brak..."
links.text: The throttle is jammed and the brakeman's nowhere to be seen! There's no getting off this ride!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think that we should let him con..."
links.text: "I think that we should let him continue with the story."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's right! I let you finish all..."
links.text: "That's right! I let you finish all of your stories that night."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What train are you talking about?"..."
links.text: "What train are you talking about?" he asks, taking a sip of beer.

links.title: Authority: "There is no train. Just you and the..."
links.text: There is no train. Just you and the cold light of truth.

links.title: You: ""No train at all. Please continue.""
links.text: "No train at all. Please continue."

links.title: You: ""Oh yeah, not the first time this c..."
links.text: "Oh yeah, not the first time this comes up." (Cough awkwardly.)

links.title: You: ""Yeah, sure, I did that thing. What..."
links.text: "Yeah, sure, I did that thing. What of it?!"

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Does that sound like something you'..."
links.text: Does that sound like something you'd do? Yeah, probably.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's brow is furrowed...."
links.text: The lieutenant's brow is furrowed. He's listening as casually as he can.

links.title: You: ""What happened then?""
links.text: "What happened then?"

links.title: You: ""Wait. This doesn't sound like me a..."
links.text: "Wait. This doesn't sound like me at all."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Well, the *word on the street* may..."
links.text: "Well, the *word on the street* may be a rumour, but what happened next is the truth. I was there to witness it, along with these bums here."

links.title: Drama: "Lies, lies, lies! He only speaks li..."
links.text: Lies, lies, lies! He only speaks liessss.

links.title: You: ""Was I alone?""
links.text: "Was I alone?"

links.title: You: ""Tequila Sunset? That's my *nom de..."
links.text: "Tequila Sunset? That's my *nom de guerre*!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It definitely is.""
links.text: "It definitely is."

links.title: You: ""Do you know me?""
links.text: "Do you know me?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Oh, do I? Of course. Don't you rem..."
links.text: "Oh, do I? Of course. Don't you remember?"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Nope, you sure don't."
links.text: Nope, you sure don't.

links.title: You: ""No.""
links.text: "No."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Aha!" He takes a sip from his beer..."
links.text: "Aha!" He takes a sip from his beer. "Do you want to know how Tequila Sunset came to be?"

links.title: Inland Empire: "Tequila... Tequila Sunset... Someth..."
links.text: Tequila... Tequila Sunset... Something ominous there.

links.title: You: ""For some reason the name Tequila f..."
links.text: "For some reason the name Tequila fills me with foreboding. Maybe I *shouldn't* learn what it means."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You think you feel bad *now*, wait..."
links.text: "You think you feel bad *now*, wait till you've heard the story."

links.title: Inland Empire: "No-no. You need the *wisdom*."
links.text: No-no. You need the *wisdom*.

links.title: You: ""Go ahead.""
links.text: "Go ahead."

links.title: You: ""No, this sounds scary." (Back up.)"
links.text: "No, this sounds scary." (Back up.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Suit yourself, Mr. Sunset." He shr..."
links.text: "Suit yourself, Mr. Sunset." He shrugs.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I don't think you're ready for tha..."
links.text: "I don't think you're ready for that *grade* of reality yet. It'd be ill-advised for me to tell you. You gotta go do the *intro* yourself -- come back when you've been to the motor carriage, Tequila." He sips his beer.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "He points toward the waterline with..."
links.text: He points toward the waterline with his bottle.

links.title: You: ""Maybe?""
links.text: "Maybe?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Maybe?" He takes a sip from his be..."
links.text: "Maybe?" He takes a sip from his beer. "You look like you want to know how Tequila Sunset came to be. You look like you want to hear *the tale*."

links.title: You: ""What is a... Tequila Sunset? You k..."
links.text: "What is a... Tequila Sunset? You keep saying it."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It's you. You're Tequila Sunset.""
links.text: "It's you. You're Tequila Sunset."

links.title: You: ""How do you know this?""
links.text: "How do you know this?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""We've met before, don't you rememb..."
links.text: "We've met before, don't you remember?"

links.title: You: ""Okay, I changed my mind. Sing me t..."
links.text: "Okay, I changed my mind. Sing me the song of Tequila Sunset."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Mhm. Let me take a sip to moisten..."
links.text: "Mhm. Let me take a sip to moisten up my cords..." He takes a big sip, then begins: "Tequila Sunset rolled into Martinaise last Friday. And by *Tequila Sunset* I mean *you* -- the man, the myth."

links.title: You: ""I want to hear the story of your n..."
links.text: "I want to hear the story of your name again."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What's in a name..." He looks up t..."
links.text: "What's in a name..." He looks up to the sky as if pondering the question, then turns back to you.

links.title: Rosemary: ""Hey, Spiral-Boy, you gonna share t..."
links.text: "Hey, Spiral-Boy, you gonna share that?" one of the other bums interjects.

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't call Abigail!""
links.text: "Don't call Abigail!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Shut up, guys, I'm telling a story..."
links.text: "Shut up, guys, I'm telling a story here." He turns to you. "Something happened to you. Something happened to me, too -- my actual name is George, but around here... you already know..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I was a once a reasonably high-net..."
links.text: "I was a once a reasonably high-net-worth individual. A founder slash junior partner at a high-concept creative services agency. When my story begins, I had just landed a major contract with an insurance firm..."

links.title: You: ""Go on.""
links.text: "Go on."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I used the profits from my agency..."
links.text: "I used the profits from my agency to finance what I called a 'cultural incubator' -- abstract value generation, value per person, high-concept stuff..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I developed the paradigm, worked w..."
links.text: "I developed the paradigm, worked within the paradigm. But the burden of leadership weighed heavily on me, so I went jogging every so often to keep myself sane."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "That's right. Getting a good run in..."
links.text: That's right. Getting a good run in's important to maintaining your physical *and* mental health.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Speaking of, when's the last time y..."
links.text: Speaking of, when's the last time you did your laps, porkchop?

links.title: You: ""Wait -- how many people did you ha..."
links.text: "Wait -- how many people did you have working for you?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Twenty-two full-time employees. An..."
links.text: "Twenty-two full-time employees. An all-star team. A potentially historical set of individuals. Worrying about them often kept me up well into the morning hours."

links.title: You: ""I could probably use a good run my..."
links.text: "I could probably use a good run myself."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It helped, truly. With my trusty S..."
links.text: "It helped, truly. With my trusty Sansarique Lickra(TM) tracksuit I felt like I could conquer the world..."

links.title: You: ""Did the jogging help?""
links.text: "Did the jogging help?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It did. With my trusty Sansarique..."
links.text: "It did. With my trusty Sansarique tracksuit I felt like I could conquer the world..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""But now dreams are worn thin, much..."
links.text: "But now dreams are worn thin, much like my tracksuit," he says thoughtfully, brushing dust off his shit-stained pants.

links.title: You: ""What happened?""
links.text: "What happened?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""One day I left on my evening run...."
links.text: "One day I left on my evening run. As you may know, it's impossible to clear your head when you're distracted by the sound of keys jangling in your pockets." He shakes the bottle and makes a ringing sound.

links.title: Half Light: "He's right. It's incredibly annoyin..."
links.text: He's right. It's incredibly annoying.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "His eyes are clouded, his dilated b..."
links.text: His eyes are clouded, his dilated blood vessels encircling his irises like stinging brambles.

links.title: Conceptualization: "His eyes are your eyes."
links.text: His eyes are your eyes.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""So I removed the keyring and put t..."
links.text: "So I removed the keyring and put the keys for the front gate and the apartment into different pockets, to stop the jangling, you see. At least that was the plan..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I was halfway done with my usual l..."
links.text: "I was halfway done with my usual lap when it started to rain. The reality situation became very wet, very quickly."

links.title: You: ""How *wet* are we talking exactly?""
links.text: "How *wet* are we talking exactly?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It was a day not unlike this one h..."
links.text: "It was a day not unlike this one here..." You both glance skyward.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*Wet*, okay? It was raining really..."
links.text: "*Wet*, okay? It was raining really hard." There's a trace of derision in his voice.

links.title: You: ""Go on.""
links.text: "Go on."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I made my way back home and discov..."
links.text: "I made my way back home and discovered that I didn't have the key to the front gate -- I'd mixed it up with the key to the letter box. Which was useless."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Naturally, the situation required..."
links.text: "Naturally, the situation required me to climb over the gate, which I did. There was no climbing down, because I slipped and landed on my ass."

links.title: You: ""Ouch!""
links.text: "Ouch!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Ouch, indeed. Reality was looking..."
links.text: "Ouch, indeed. Reality was looking rather grim, just then -- me lying on my ass in a mud pit in the middle of a heavy shower. But when life knocked me down, I always got up..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""So I made my way across the yard...."
links.text: "So I made my way across the yard. Standing in front of my apartment door, fumbling with my pockets, I realized that I'd *also* forgotten my apartment key!"

links.title: You: ""You've got to be shitting me!""
links.text: "You've got to be shitting me!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I wish I were, Tequila. I wish I w..."
links.text: "I wish I were, Tequila. I wish I were." He turns his head towards the skies. "Instead of my apartment key, I'd taken the key to the office."

links.title: You: ""Okay, so what happened next?""
links.text: "Okay, so what happened next?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I rang my neighbours' buzzers. It..."
links.text: "I rang my neighbours' buzzers. It was late, and most of them didn't even answer. Those who did assumed I was trying to sell them something and hung up before I could even explain the situation..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""People are naturally wary of ad me..."
links.text: "People are naturally wary of ad men, you see. One moment someone chats you up, five minutes later you've bought a box of edible lingerie and a strap-on. I don't begrudge them, especially since I was known to be one of the best..." He pauses meaningfully.

links.title: Empathy: "Heavy is the head that wears the cr..."
links.text: Heavy is the head that wears the crown.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Just then I experienced a moment o..."
links.text: "Just then I experienced a moment of clarity: I still had the key to my office! I could wait out the storm there..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""But when I reached my office I rem..."
links.text: "But when I reached my office I remembered that I'd asked one of my producers to change the locks that day -- and since I hired only the best, he'd already done it, and I couldn't get in..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Anyway, long story short, life spi..."
links.text: "Anyway, long story short, life spiralled out of control. I haven't gotten into my apartment for years, and my girlfriend left me because she didn't want to date a homeless man. The company, well, you see where I'm going with this..."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "He pinches his thigh as if to check..."
links.text: He pinches his thigh as if to check whether this reality is *the reality*.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""So, now you've heard my tragic tal..."
links.text: "So, now you've heard my tragic tale. What do you think? Like nothing you've ever heard, huh?" He takes a long swig of his drink.

links.title: You: ""Wait, is that it? I feel like ther..."
links.text: "Wait, is that it? I feel like there are some steps missing."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Tequila, I've thought about this s..."
links.text: "Tequila, I've thought about this series of events for a long time. If there was anything else to it, I would have thought of it by now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why didn't you go to the authoriti..."
links.text: "Why didn't you go to the authorities?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Well, at one point they came to me..."
links.text: "Well, at one point they came to me, but you know, I didn't have any ID on me -- so they tossed me in jail for two days..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I can't say it increased my faith..."
links.text: "I can't say it increased my faith in the RCM. No offence, gentlemen." He shakes his head.

links.title: You: ""I've only been a hobo cop for a fe..."
links.text: "I've only been a hobo cop for a few days now, but it doesn't seem so bad."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""The hobo lifestyle definitely has..."
links.text: "The hobo lifestyle definitely has some perks -- not having to pay rent, first and foremost. Not being responsible for twenty other people is nice too."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""But that charm wears off pretty qu..."
links.text: "But that charm wears off pretty quickly. Before you know it, you're wearing a shit-stained tracksuit and spending your days picking tare."

links.title: You: ""I'm almost homeless myself. Doesn'..."
links.text: "I'm almost homeless myself. Doesn't seem so bad."

links.title: You: ""Look on the bright side -- you've..."
links.text: "Look on the bright side -- you've got one hell of a story."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah. Maybe I've exaggerated certa..."
links.text: "Yeah. Maybe I've exaggerated certain parts over the years. When you tell a story too often, it begins to take on a life of its own..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""But what matters is that it's true..."
links.text: "But what matters is that it's true to my subjective experience. Anyway, that was all the story one bottle gets you." He looks at it. "Almost empty this one..."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Truly, he has the soul of an artist..."
links.text: Truly, he has the soul of an artist.

links.title: You: ""You do realize all of this is your..."
links.text: "You do realize all of this is your own fault?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I don't remember you being such a..."
links.text: "I don't remember you being such a dick before, Tequila..." He takes a slow, despondent sip from his bottle, then looks out across the bay toward the glittering lights of La Delta at night.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That doesn't mean you're wrong, th..."
links.text: "That doesn't mean you're wrong, though... Anyway, that was all the tale one bottle gets you." He turns his eyes to the bottle. "Almost empty this one..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I don't remember you being such a..."
links.text: "I don't remember you being such a dick before, Tequila..." He takes a slow, despondent sip from his bottle, then looks out across the bay toward the skyscrapers of La Delta.

links.title: You: ""There's this black point in the wo..."
links.text: "There's this black point in the world, a hole. It's already claimed an entire commercial area, maybe you're another one of its victims?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""This would explain a lot -- I alwa..."
links.text: "This would explain a lot -- I always believed it wasn't my fault that I ended up homeless on the beach with these two bums." He looks at his partners with a glint of sadness.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""God bless them, though. I'd be alo..."
links.text: "God bless them, though. I'd be alone without them. Anyway, that was all the story one bottle gets you." He turns his eyes to the bottle. "Almost empty this one..."

links.title: You: ""I literally can't believe it.""
links.text: "I literally can't believe it."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Me neither, Tequila. When I lost m..."
links.text: "Me neither, Tequila. When I lost my keys, I lost more than access to my apartment -- I also lost my leverage over humanity. I wasn't a high-concept creative director anymore, I was just some homeless asshole with a premium Sansarique Lickra(TM) tracksuit."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You can't imagine what that does t..."
links.text: "You can't imagine what that does to a man's confidence." He turns his eyes to the bottle. "Anyway, that was all the story one bottle gets you. Almost empty this one..."

links.title: You: ""I would've landed on my feet. I've..."
links.text: "I would've landed on my feet. I've got feline reflexes."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "No, you don't."
links.text: No, you don't.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Whatever. The point is, reality wa..."
links.text: "Whatever. The point is, reality was looking rather grim, just then -- me lying on my ass in a mud pit in the middle of a heavy shower. But when life knocked me down, I always got up..."

links.title: You: "(Say nothing.)"
links.text: (Say nothing.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Reality was looking rather grim, j..."
links.text: "Reality was looking rather grim, just then -- me lying on my ass in a mud pit in the middle of a heavy shower. But when life knocked me down, I always got up..."

links.title: You: ""Wait, on the second thought -- I'v..."
links.text: "Wait, on the second thought -- I've heard enough."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""So you *don't* want to just hear t..."
links.text: "So you *don't* want to just hear the same story again? Okay, okay. Huh." He looks taken aback.

links.title: You: ""I'd like to listen to the tale of..."
links.text: "I'd like to listen to the tale of the Headless FALN Rider again."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He breathes in deeply, preparing hi..."
links.text: He breathes in deeply, preparing his recitation...

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""The tale I'm about to tell you is..."
links.text: "The tale I'm about to tell you is an urban legend particular to Martinaise." He lifts the bottle to his lips and takes a long, luxuriant sip. "That said, I first heard it from a former bicycle courier in Couron..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""There are many variations on the b..."
links.text: "There are many variations on the basic story, and the details often conflict. What everyone agrees on is that nobody knows the exact nature or identity of... the phenomenon."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Are you telling the story of the H..."
links.text: "Are you telling the story of the Headless--"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Shut the fuck up, Rosemary!""
links.text: "Shut the fuck up, Rosemary!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He clears his throat: "Summer of '4..."
links.text: He clears his throat: "Summer of '44. Seventeen-year-old Gertrude Het is walking home from a late shift at the harbour. It's almost midnight. She stops for a cigarette near the canal..."

links.title: Shivers: "The streets are warmed by a souther..."
links.text: The streets are warmed by a southerly breeze. The lights of a passing motor carriage bloom and fade in the distance...

links.title: Shivers: "In the harbour's dark, her cigarett..."
links.text: In the harbour's dark, her cigarette is a beacon, dancing alone. The image comes to you effortlessly, as though you'd walked the same streets yourself a thousand times.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Our heroine finds herself enjoying..."
links.text: "Our heroine finds herself enjoying the peace and quiet the canal provides..." He looks up to the skies as if searching for peace himself...

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What she doesn't know is that her..."
links.text: "What she doesn't know is that her peace is about to be shattered. From behind her comes the clattering of hooves. Startled, she turns around, and what does she see?"

links.title: You: ""The Headless FALN Rider?""
links.text: "The Headless FALN Rider?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Excuse me, are you telling the sto..."
links.text: "Excuse me, are you telling the story, now? No? You're not? Well then..." He scoffs.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It's the *Headless FALN Rider*. A..."
links.text: "It's the *Headless FALN Rider*. A headless man wearing a FALN tracksuit. Riding a horse. In search for the FALN cap that went missing -- when he lost his head."

links.title: You: ""Wait, I thought that the Headless..."
links.text: "Wait, I thought that the Headless FALN Rider rode a bull?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I thought that he rode a headless..."
links.text: "I thought that he rode a headless pig?" The lieutenant says with a little smirk.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Well, there are many versions of t..."
links.text: "Well, there are many versions of this story, the most peculiar of which has the Headless FALN Rider riding on the back of another headless man."

links.title: You: ""Whoa.""
links.text: "Whoa."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Whoa is right, my friend. Gertrude..."
links.text: "Whoa is right, my friend. Gertrude Het may have been the first to witness the *Headless FALN Rider*, but she wasn't the last, oh no..."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Tell 'em about the two feminists b..."
links.text: "Tell 'em about the two feminists by the locks!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Fuck, Rosemary, they were dating -..."
links.text: "Fuck, Rosemary, they were dating -- no one said they were feminists. Everyone always misremembering this stuff..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmmm, this wouldn't be the Deponte..."
links.text: "Hmmm, this wouldn't be the Deponte-Delgado case, would it?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What? You know it?""
links.text: "What? You know it?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I've read the case file. But pleas..."
links.text: "I've read the case file. But please, go on."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Right. *Ahem*. Early autumn of '46..."
links.text: "Right. *Ahem*. Early autumn of '46. Ulla Deponte and Eva Delgado are fishing near the water lock long after the sun has set..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""The wind picks up, a sky already d..."
links.text: "The wind picks up, a sky already dark now blackens. Water starts falling from above, the first cold rain of the season..."

links.title: Shivers: "Two women stand on a small outcropp..."
links.text: Two women stand on a small outcropping of rocks. One of them is wearing a purple raincoat. Thin lines reach out from the rods into the sea. Small droplets start appearing on the surface with increasing frequency.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""The women are caught in the downpo..."
links.text: "The women are caught in the downpour. They act quickly. Eva gathers the rods whilst Ulla turns around to reach for the tackle box..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Don't turn around, don't turn aroun..."
links.text: Don't turn around, don't turn around!

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""When she sees something! Her shrie..."
links.text: "When she sees something! Her shriek is so violent that the residents of the nearby apartment building believe lightning has struck..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""But there is no lightning. Only a..."
links.text: "But there is no lightning. Only a heavy downpour and the silhouette of the *Headless FALN Rider* looming on the horizon!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Ulla makes a run for the shore, bu..."
links.text: "Ulla makes a run for the shore, but Eva slips on a wet rock and disappears into the cold, cold canal with nary a sound..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "The man falls ominously silent for..."
links.text: The man falls ominously silent for a moment. "Her body is never recovered." He looks you straight in the eye.

links.title: You: ""What did the case file say?" (Ask..."
links.text: "What did the case file say?" (Ask Kim.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Naturally, Ulla Deponte became the..."
links.text: "Naturally, Ulla Deponte became the prime suspect in the disappearance of Eva Delgado. Deponte maintained that it was the so-called 'Headless FALN Rider' and that she ran, fearing for her life..." He adjusts his glasses.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""During the investigation it became..."
links.text: "During the investigation it became apparent that there was a love triangle, the third party being some small-time businessman -- I don't remember the exact details. The leading theory was that an argument broke out on the jetty and Deponte pushed Delgado into the canal, then cooked up this stupid cover story."

links.title: You: ""Was she arrested?""
links.text: "Was she arrested?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. She committed suicide before s..."
links.text: "No. She committed suicide before she could be taken into custody. They found her in the bathroom with a rifle, her face slowly peeling off the ceiling..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not a pretty scene.""
links.text: "Not a pretty scene."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Man, that's some grisly detail. Oh..."
links.text: "Man, that's some grisly detail. Oh well, here's to another case closed!" He takes a hearty swig from his bottle.

links.title: You: ""What happened to Ulla Deponte?""
links.text: "What happened to Ulla Deponte?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Word on the street is that she, yo..."
links.text: "Word on the street is that she, you know..." He makes a finger pistol with his right hand and lifts it up to his chin.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Gave herself facial deconstruction..."
links.text: "Gave herself facial deconstruction surgery. Real grisly stuff."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That part at least more or less co..."
links.text: "That part at least more or less corresponds to the case file."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""See? Told you." The man takes a lo..."
links.text: "See? Told you." The man takes a long, self-satisfied sip.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Anyway, that's the story of the *H..."
links.text: "Anyway, that's the story of the *Headless FALN Rider*. Pretty crazy, huh?"

links.title: You: ""Who was the Headless Rider before..."
links.text: "Who was the Headless Rider before he died?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Well, Tequila, that's part of the..."
links.text: "Well, Tequila, that's part of the legend -- no one knows for sure. There are a couple of possibilities, though..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Some say he was an undercover cop..."
links.text: "Some say he was an undercover cop who blew his cover and got beheaded by the vicious gang he had infiltrated -- Now he rides, searching for his lost FALN cap, plotting revenge."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Oh, headless brother, where art tho..."
links.text: Oh, headless brother, where art thou?

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Others claim he was a professional..."
links.text: "Others claim he was a professional jockey who veered off-course during a steeple chase, ended up in somebody's back yard, and got decapitated by an exceptionally taut clothes line..."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Even decapitation couldn't stop his..."
links.text: Even decapitation couldn't stop his commitment to the sport. Are *you* that committed?

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Personally, I think he was just so..."
links.text: "Personally, I think he was just some guy who hanged himself from a really tall tree and the fall was so violent that his head came clean off..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Coincidentally, at that exact mome..."
links.text: "Coincidentally, at that exact moment, a horse happened to pass under him and his beheaded corpse mounted it, where it remains to this day... But then, no one really knows."

links.title: Inland Empire: "For some reason this *does* strike..."
links.text: For some reason this *does* strike you as the most plausible theory of them all.

links.title: You: ""I've got a hunch that it was the u..."
links.text: "I've got a hunch that it was the undercover cop. I'd want revenge, too."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That would explain the tracksuit,..."
links.text: "That would explain the tracksuit, and his need for revenge. Not sure how the horse fits in, though. I dunno, I don't buy it..." He shrugs.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Anyway, to each his own. You want..."
links.text: "Anyway, to each his own. You want to hear any other stories?"

links.title: You: ""I bet he was the jockey. He seems..."
links.text: "I bet he was the jockey. He seems super committed to his sport."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That explains the horse part, for..."
links.text: "That explains the horse part, for sure. Don't know why he'd be wearing a tracksuit, though. Seems like a stretch, if you ask me..."

links.title: You: ""I've got to agree -- your theory s..."
links.text: "I've got to agree -- your theory sounds the most plausible."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Isn't it? All the pieces fit toget..."
links.text: "Isn't it? All the pieces fit together perfectly. That's how I know it's right..."

links.title: You: ""None of those really sound plausib..."
links.text: "None of those really sound plausible, to be honest."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Pffft," he spits. "Like you could..."
links.text: "Pffft," he spits. "Like you could do better, Tequila..."

links.title: You: ""I've already seen some weird shit..."
links.text: "I've already seen some weird shit on this case. A headless jockey in a tracksuit fits right in."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hard to argue with that, I suppose.""
links.text: "Hard to argue with that, I suppose."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's the reality situation for y..."
links.text: "That's the reality situation for you. You think you got a handle on it, then *BLAM*! It throws some wild shit at you..." He takes a long swig, then smiles. "That's why it's critical to stay well hydrated."

links.title: You: ""That's nothing. I've got an even *..."
links.text: "That's nothing. I've got an even *crazier* story."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah? Why don't you go eat shit, T..."
links.text: "Yeah? Why don't you go eat shit, Tequila? There's no way you know a better one than that."

links.title: You: ""What about the Col Do Ma Ma Daqua?..."
links.text: "What about the Col Do Ma Ma Daqua? It's a magical self-replicating sound!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I have to admit, that's pretty hig..."
links.text: "I have to admit, that's pretty high-concept. Still not as awesome as a headless rider in a FALN tracksuit, though."

links.title: You: ""The Gnome of Geroma dissolves its..."
links.text: "The Gnome of Geroma dissolves its victims with acid."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Acid gnomes? Sounds like a stupid,..."
links.text: "Acid gnomes? Sounds like a stupid, low-concept band name."

links.title: You: ""The Giant of Koko Nur is as big as..."
links.text: "The Giant of Koko Nur is as big as a mountain."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Giants? That the best you got? Giv..."
links.text: "Giants? That the best you got? Give me a break, Tequila."

links.title: You: ""There's the Kind Green Ape. It's v..."
links.text: "There's the Kind Green Ape. It's very kind... and green."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Do you always try to pick the lame..."
links.text: "Do you always try to pick the lamest option possible? Come on, Tequila!"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, actually -- you're right. No..."
links.text: "Yeah, actually -- you're right. Nothing comes to mind."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Damn right it doesn't. So why don'..."
links.text: "Damn right it doesn't. So why don't you just shut up and leave it to the *master*?"

links.title: You: ""Okay. Whatever became of the Headl..."
links.text: "Okay. Whatever became of the Headless FALN Rider?" (Conclude.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No one knows. Some say he stalks M..."
links.text: "No one knows. Some say he stalks Martinaise to this day, and can be seen near the canal when the clock strikes midnight." He makes a spooky gesture with his free hand.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant smirks. "He won't th..."
links.text: The lieutenant smirks. "He won't though, because it's just a stupid legend."

links.title: Rosemary: ""Aye! I saw him one night when I we..."
links.text: "Aye! I saw him one night when I were right shit faced!"

links.title: You: ""That sounds pretty implausible to..."
links.text: "That sounds pretty implausible to me."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""If I hadn't lost my keys that one..."
links.text: "If I hadn't lost my keys that one time, I'd agree with you. But... life is a cruel mistress..." He takes a sip.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Gertrude Het may have been the fir..."
links.text: "Gertrude Het may have been the first to witness the *Headless FALN Rider*, but she wasn't the last, oh no..."

links.title: You: ""That's super spooky.""
links.text: "That's super spooky."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yes. According to legend, young Ge..."
links.text: "Yes. According to legend, young Gertrude Het had to endure years of psychotherapy before she was able to look at a horse or tracksuit again... And she's one of the *lucky ones*." He takes a sip from his bottle.

links.title: You: ""I don't know, what?""
links.text: "I don't know, what?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""A headless man, wearing a FALN tra..."
links.text: "A headless man, wearing a FALN tracksuit, riding a horse. That's right. It's the *Headless FALN Rider*. "

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Rumoured to be searching for his l..."
links.text: "Rumoured to be searching for his legendary FALN cap that went missing when he lost his head."

links.title: You: ""A horse?""
links.text: "A horse?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Well, yes, but it's the man *on* t..."
links.text: "Well, yes, but it's the man *on* the horse that's of interest here. A man..."

links.title: Drama: "...the pause is long and dramatic....."
links.text: ...the pause is long and dramatic...

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""... with no head on his shoulders!..."
links.text: "... with no head on his shoulders! Wearing a FALN tracksuit. Searching for the legendary FALN cap that went missing -- when he lost his head."

links.title: You: ""The Giant of Koko Nur?""
links.text: "The Giant of Koko Nur?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What? No! I told you this is a *Ma..."
links.text: "What? No! I told you this is a *Martinaise* legend. It's a man..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You got a smoke on you? If yeah, yo..."
links.text: You got a smoke on you? If yeah, you should light up, help set the scene...

links.title: You: ""Can you tell me about the Cocaine..."
links.text: "Can you tell me about the Cocaine Skull again?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Right... a story specific to Marti..."
links.text: "Right... a story specific to Martinaise and its history." He takes a sip and gargles the drink to prepare.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I've never heard it mentioned outs..."
links.text: "I've never heard it mentioned outside of here... At first I thought it was a joke, to be honest. But I've been on the coast eight, nine months now and in that time I've seen at least three expeditions come through, searching for something."

links.title: Shivers: "A shovel hits the sand somewhere be..."
links.text: A shovel hits the sand somewhere behind the reeds, near an abandoned construction yard. The young men look over their shoulders, suspiciously. The sound of their digging seems loud in the sudden silence.

links.title: You: ""Cryptids?""
links.text: "Cryptids?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Magic animals? No man, this is *se..."
links.text: "Magic animals? No man, this is *serious stuff*..."

links.title: You: ""A place to call home?""
links.text: "A place to call home?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No, Tequila. Most people already k..."
links.text: "No, Tequila. Most people already know where they live. It's guys like you and me that are the exceptions..."

links.title: You: ""Your lost keys?""
links.text: "Your lost keys?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hey, HEY. Fuck you, Tequila," he s..."
links.text: "Hey, HEY. Fuck you, Tequila," he says, his voice level.

links.title: You: ""Okay, what kind of expeditions?""
links.text: "Okay, what kind of expeditions?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""All kinds. I've seen archaeologist..."
links.text: "All kinds. I've seen archaeologists, gangsters, even a bunch of ad agency types. I'm telling you, Tequila -- this thing's got a *pull* on certain kinds of people."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Wait, there's a tingling back here...."
links.text: Wait, there's a tingling back here... the stirring of a faint sensation...

links.title: You: ""Wait, what do you mean 'certain ki..."
links.text: "Wait, what do you mean 'certain kinds of people'?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You know, *obsessive* types. Peopl..."
links.text: "You know, *obsessive* types. People with *predilections*..."

links.title: You: ""What exactly are we talking about..."
links.text: "What exactly are we talking about here?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Some of those expeditions come bac..."
links.text: "Some of those expeditions come back after a week or so, looking haggard and dejected. Others don't return at all..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""The first time I saw one of these..."
links.text: "The first time I saw one of these expeditions, I thought they were fucking with me. There was no way it could be true. It was just *too high-concept*, even for me..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "There's no way... it can't be... or..."
links.text: There's no way... it can't be... or *can* it?

links.title: You: "Can't be what?"
links.text: Can't be what?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You know..."
links.text: You know...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Wait... There's no way... It can't..."
links.text: Wait... There's no way... It can't be... or *can* it?

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I'm not even sure I should be tell..."
links.text: "I'm not even sure I should be telling you this story, to be perfectly honest. You're in a fragile state, and it might be too much for you to handle."

links.title: You: ""I can handle it.""
links.text: "I can handle it."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Okay, fine, I'll tell you. But I'm..."
links.text: "Okay, fine, I'll tell you. But I'm warning you, it's pretty *out there*." His eyes narrow with mystery. "Our story begins at a legendary design studio, right here in Martinaise..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""There was this designer, his exact..."
links.text: "There was this designer, his exact name is lost to history, but in life he was a legend. Made it big in Oranje, where he did some real pioneering work on grotesque and sans-serif typography. A fucking genius, man..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He takes a swig, wipes his mouth, t..."
links.text: He takes a swig, wipes his mouth, then continues. "That is, if he even existed. Who knows? It's an urban legend, after all..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "He existed alright. You feel it dee..."
links.text: He existed alright. You feel it deep within your basal ganglia. He was as real as you are...

links.title: You: "What the fuck are you talking about..."
links.text: What the fuck are you talking about?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "I'm talking about..."
links.text: I'm talking about...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "He existed alright. You feel it dee..."
links.text: He existed alright. You feel it deep within your basal ganglia. He was as real as you are...

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Anyway, sometime later he started..."
links.text: "Anyway, sometime later he started his own personal studio here in Martinaise, and that's when he started working on some *really* wild stuff. I'm talking some glass-smooth, forward looking design language, the kind of thing that would totally overthrow the old regime, design-wise."

links.title: Conceptualization: "A paradigm-shattering revolutionary..."
links.text: A paradigm-shattering revolutionary!?

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""But then, something turned. You se..."
links.text: "But then, something turned. You see, it's widely known that *nose candy* and pioneer graphic design work go hand-in-hand..."

links.title: You: ""Wait -- nose candy?""
links.text: "Wait -- nose candy?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You know, Tequila." He taps the si..."
links.text: "You know, Tequila." He taps the side of his nose twice. "*Nose* candy. The white railroad. *Party powder*!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The kids on the street also call i..."
links.text: "The kids on the street also call it 'snow day'..."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Or 'Irmalan Gold,' for the plateau..."
links.text: Or 'Irmalan Gold,' for the plateau on which most of the world's supply is grown and harvested, typically by slave labour...

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""'Sinus salt,' 'the white knight'....."
links.text: "'Sinus salt,' 'the white knight'...."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""'Count C,' for its popularity amon..."
links.text: "'Count C,' for its popularity among the aristocratic class of the prior century..."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Along with a number of more banal s..."
links.text: Along with a number of more banal street names: Blow, of course, but also flake, powder, pearl. Really anything that's white will work.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Along with a number of more banal s..."
links.text: Along with a number of more banal street names: Blow, of course, but also flake, powder, pearl. Really anything that's white will get the idea across.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "HE'S TALKING ABOUT COCAINE."
links.text: HE'S TALKING ABOUT COCAINE.

links.title: You: ""*Ohhh*, you mean *cocaine*.""
links.text: "*Ohhh*, you mean *cocaine*."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Shit yeah, Tequila! You know *exac..."
links.text: "Shit yeah, Tequila! You know *exactly* what I'm talking about." He gives you a comradely bump on the shoulder as a couple millilitres of booze slosh out of his bottle.

links.title: You: ""Makes sense. I, too, need a variet..."
links.text: "Makes sense. I, too, need a variety of substances to operate at a high level."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I'm not surprised. Many men find i..."
links.text: "I'm not surprised. Many men find it hard reaching that final level of genius without blow."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "HE'S TALKING ABOUT COCAINE, BABY."
links.text: HE'S TALKING ABOUT COCAINE, BABY.

links.title: You: ""Are you referring to... *cocaine*?""
links.text: "Are you referring to... *cocaine*?"

links.title: You: ""So what happened to him?""
links.text: "So what happened to him?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You've got to understand... the wo..."
links.text: "You've got to understand... the work *this* guy was doing was *so* high-concept that regular amounts of cocaine just weren't cutting it. By the end they were bringing it in by the lorry load."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Now, as you might imagine, snortin..."
links.text: "Now, as you might imagine, snorting that much cocaine can't be healthy for a regular human, right?"

links.title: Endurance: "Right."
links.text: Right.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "WRONG! Do it all the time."
links.text: WRONG! Do it all the time.

links.title: You: "Uhh... all the time?"
links.text: Uhh... all the time?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "All day, baby..."
links.text: All day, baby...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "WRONG. It's *super healthy*. Your b..."
links.text: WRONG. It's *super healthy*. Your brain tells you so, and when has your own brain ever lied to you?

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hey, Tequila, pay attention! The s..."
links.text: "Hey, Tequila, pay attention! The story goes that one day he was balls-deep in work on what he thought would be his *pièce de résistance*: An advert so *minimal* it contained neither text nor images. Just... pure white..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Apparently the idea was *too* high..."
links.text: "Apparently the idea was *too* high-concept even for this genius. He dropped dead right at his desk before he could finish. His last words are recorded to have been: "It's as white as a blizzard... *of cocaine!*"

links.title: You: ""What a loss for the world of desig..."
links.text: "What a loss for the world of design."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I know, Tequila, I know..." He tak..."
links.text: "I know, Tequila, I know..." He takes a swig, considers pouring some out for this lost genius, then thinks better of it.

links.title: You: ""What a stupid fucking idea.""
links.text: "What a stupid fucking idea."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""But the story doesn't end there. S..."
links.text: "But the story doesn't end there. Supposedly, when they performed the autopsy, the coroner discovered nearly a *quarter kilo of coke* jammed into his nasal cavity."

links.title: Logic: "That's... almost certainly anatomic..."
links.text: That's... almost certainly anatomically impossible.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "WRONG AGAIN, NERD. Where there's a..."
links.text: WRONG AGAIN, NERD. Where there's a will, there's a way.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "WRONG, NERD! Where there's a will,..."
links.text: WRONG, NERD! Where there's a will, there's a way.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's right. Two-hundred fifty gr..."
links.text: "That's right. Two-hundred fifty grams of blow had *accumulated* in there over the years. We're talking high-grade Saramirizian pure, not that cut-rate shit your grandma does."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""There are those who believe that t..."
links.text: "There are those who believe that the designer was buried with this quarter-key of nose candy still lodged in his sinuses. *That's* what those expeditions are looking for..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "THE COCAINE SKULL."
links.text: THE COCAINE SKULL.

links.title: You: ""The Cocaine... Skull...""
links.text: "The Cocaine... Skull..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*The Cocaine Skull*!""
links.text: "*The Cocaine Skull*!"

links.title: You: ""Wow.""
links.text: "Wow."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No," he corrects you: "WOW!!""
links.text: "No," he corrects you: "WOW!!"

links.title: You: ""And why do people think the skull..."
links.text: "And why do people think the skull is here, in Martinaise?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Here's the kicker -- this designer..."
links.text: "Here's the kicker -- this designer, this *lead designer* of a world famous design studio -- was *born* in Martinaise. A local boy. Martin Martinaise."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's why he brought his studio h..."
links.text: "That's why he brought his studio here -- back to where it all began. And that's why  they buried him here too -- perhaps right under Abs' pipe there..." he points to the pipe.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Or probably further down the coast..."
links.text: "Or probably further down the coast? Or in some yard in Martinaise proper. A hidden mausoleum? No one knows exactly."

links.title: Rosemary: ""No, my grandma' always told me his..."
links.text: "No, my grandma' always told me his grave lays somewhere on the islets on the bay..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is ludicrous." The lieutenant..."
links.text: "This is ludicrous." The lieutenant turns to you. "And physically impossible. Sinuses can't contain that amount of anything."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Now, now detective... always the sc..."
links.text: Now, now detective... always the sceptic.

links.title: Interfacing: "My only question is -- where does o..."
links.text: My only question is -- where does one get a *shovel*?

links.title: You: ""What do these expeditions plan to..."
links.text: "What do these expeditions plan to do with it?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""The archaeologists say they want t..."
links.text: "The archaeologists say they want to put it in a museum. The gangsters say they want to sell it on the black market. And the ad agency guys say they're seeking inspiration..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Bullshit. They just want to snort i..."
links.text: Bullshit. They just want to snort it. But you could beat them to it, Harry. *You* could snort the magic skull cocaine instead...

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I'm pretty sure they all just want..."
links.text: "I'm pretty sure they all just want to snort it, though."

links.title: Rosemary: ""And why wouldn't they, ey? Sounds..."
links.text: "And why wouldn't they, ey? Sounds like right strong stuff."

links.title: You: ""Rosemary, you said something about..."
links.text: "Rosemary, you said something about islets?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Don't listen to him or his grandma..."
links.text: "Don't listen to him or his grandma. He's just making things up."

links.title: Rosemary: ""No, my grandma told me -- I've hea..."
links.text: "No, my grandma told me -- I've heard other people say it too. That it's underwater. Or, no..." He thinks. "Maybe it was the storm sewers..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Or maybe it's in the *air*? Or in..."
links.text: "Or maybe it's in the *air*? Or in an ancient steppe pyramid off shore?"

links.title: Inland Empire: "In a pyramid? Now that *would* be s..."
links.text: In a pyramid? Now that *would* be something...

links.title: You: ""What have you learned from the oth..."
links.text: "What have you learned from the other expeditions?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""They're pretty vague about it, in..."
links.text: "They're pretty vague about it, in general. The gangsters like to claim they're looking for the grave of a friend... with picks and shovels..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""The archaeologists act all officia..."
links.text: "The archaeologists act all official about it, saying they're conducting 'serious research'. Honestly, I think they're not really scientists, just rich."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""The junkies, for some reason, are..."
links.text: "The junkies, for some reason, are pretty upfront about it. They just say they're looking to snort some blow out of a dead man's nasal cavity."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Honest men on an honest quest. You..."
links.text: Honest men on an honest quest. You should join them.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""By now I'd say I know about as muc..."
links.text: "By now I'd say I know about as much about it as anyone on the coast."

links.title: You: ""Okay, I'm convinced. Let's go find..."
links.text: "Okay, I'm convinced. Let's go find it!" (Undertake it!)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Whoa, whoa, whoa. Hold on just a m..."
links.text: "Whoa, whoa, whoa. Hold on just a minute. Finding it right now is literally impossible."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "WHAT?"
links.text: WHAT?

links.title: You: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""For one, the way is blocked... by..."
links.text: "For one, the way is blocked... by that big lorry that says 'Delta Logistics Company' on the side. You'd *definitely* have to search the area behind that lorry too. Yet it is impassable."

links.title: You: ""Oh, right, I've seen that!""
links.text: "Oh, right, I've seen that!"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Second, outfitting an expedition l..."
links.text: "Second, outfitting an expedition like that is expensive. It'd have to be a *big production* -- to do the Cocaine Skull justice. You need new gear, people who know what they're doing, all kinds of provisions..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""And second, outfitting an expediti..."
links.text: "And second, outfitting an expedition like that is expensive. It'd have to be a *big production* to do the Cocaine Skull justice. You need new gear, people who know what they're doing, all kinds of provisions..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It's just not feasible within the..."
links.text: "It's just not feasible within the economic and temporal frame of our current setup. Matter of fact, unless a bunch of money just falls out of the sky, we might *never* know what's up with that skull."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have to agree. We barely have wh..."
links.text: "I have to agree. We barely have what we need to solve the case we've got now. We can't afford to run around chasing after quasi-mythical pieces of drug paraphernalia..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Besides, it would look *extremely*..."
links.text: "Besides, it would look *extremely* bad for the RCM to be caught up in something that has the word *COCAINE* writ large on it. The PR is tricky on this."

links.title: You: ""Damn, that's too bad.""
links.text: "Damn, that's too bad."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Wait! Maybe there's another way......"
links.text: Wait! Maybe there's another way... maybe up around the coast? Don't give up now!

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, well, that's the reality sit..."
links.text: "Yeah, well, that's the reality situation for you. Who knows, though? Maybe someday we'll get our chance..."

links.title: You: ""Who cares? It was an idiotic idea..."
links.text: "Who cares? It was an idiotic idea anyway."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "What are you talking about? Don't g..."
links.text: What are you talking about? Don't give up! Maybe there's another way... maybe up around the coast?

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Your loss. Could've been an amazin..."
links.text: "Your loss. Could've been an amazing, ridiculous adventure." He shrugs.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's alright. We've got plenty o..."
links.text: "That's alright. We've got plenty of adventures for one case."

links.title: You: ""Surprisingly, I'm not interested i..."
links.text: "Surprisingly, I'm not interested in looking for the skull."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Good thing, because I don't think..."
links.text: "Good thing, because I don't think you can find it right now anyway."

links.title: You: ""A skull filled with cocaine?""
links.text: "A skull filled with cocaine?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, dear god," the lieutenant says..."
links.text: "Oh, dear god," the lieutenant says, his palm rising to meet his face.

links.title: You: "(Say nothing.)"
links.text: (Say nothing.)

links.title: You: ""You're right, maybe it's not a goo..."
links.text: "You're right, maybe it's not a good idea."

links.title: You: ""You seem like you're characterized..."
links.text: "You seem like you're characterized by your storytelling ability -- wanna tell me another one some time?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Whoop-dee-doo. So now I'm a fuckin..."
links.text: "Whoop-dee-doo. So now I'm a fucking storyteller..." he says, slapping his knee. "Right. Why not? Better than a beach bum."

links.title: You: ""Yes -- wanna tell me how you becam..."
links.text: "Yes -- wanna tell me how you became Idiot Doom Spiral?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It depends, really. Are you willin..."
links.text: "It depends, really. Are you willing to help me out?"

links.title: Electrochemistry: "The gleam in his eyes and the slouc..."
links.text: The gleam in his eyes and the slouch in his posture is so incredibly familiar...

links.title: Drama: "You might get scammed here."
links.text: You might get scammed here.

links.title: You: ""I have a feeling that this is goin..."
links.text: "I have a feeling that this is going to cost me a lot."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No, the reality of the situation r..."
links.text: "No, the reality of the situation requires a rather modest contribution -- a little *motivational package*."

links.title: Conceptualization: "So this is how being on the other s..."
links.text: So this is how being on the other side of the barrel feels.

links.title: You: ""You want booze, don't you?""
links.text: "You want booze, don't you?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I don't *want* it, man." His eyes..."
links.text: "I don't *want* it, man." His eyes light up. "I *need* it. Can't tell stories without it -- dry stories are boring, you see."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""So, have you got anything for good..."
links.text: "So, have you got anything for good old Idiot Doom Spiral? A bottle for a story. Seems fair to me."

links.title: You: ""What do you need?""
links.text: "What do you need?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Booze. Did you already forget our..."
links.text: "Booze. Did you already forget our party?" He taps his finger to his temple. "The thing I relayed to you earlier?"

links.title: You: ""No, actually I've heard enough sto..."
links.text: "No, actually I've heard enough stories for a lifetime. They s-u-c-k. Goodbye." [Leave.]

links.title: Inland Empire: "...is what you almost say, but the..."
links.text: ...is what you almost say, but the words choke in your throat. Do you really want to miss out on all this good stuff? Perhaps it's *significant*.

links.title: You: "Why not? What's in it for me anyway..."
links.text: Why not? What's in it for me anyway?

links.title: Inland Empire: "There might be interesting details,..."
links.text: There might be interesting details, fresh experiences, exciting rewards... you'd really ignore it all?

links.title: You: "(Yes, say it. Say it!) "Stories *SU..."
