links.text: (Yes, say it. Say it!) "Stories *SUUCCKK*! I don't want to hear any of them. Ever!"

links.title: You: "Oh, no. I wouldn't want that. Not a..."
links.text: Oh, no. I wouldn't want that. Not at all.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Exactly. So you know what to say."
links.text: Exactly. So you know what to say.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, you look like someone with a..."
links.text: "Yeah, you look like someone with a lot of cool stories. Wanna tell me how you even became Idiot Doom Spiral?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Whuh...? Uh... geez," he stammers...."
links.text: "Whuh...? Uh... geez," he stammers. "I told you I wasn't much of a storyteller. It's okay, I didn't want to tell them anyway."

links.title: You: ""Hey, sorry for being a buzzkill ea..."
links.text: "Hey, sorry for being a buzzkill earlier. I'll supply the booze if you'll supply the stories."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Wonderful!" He claps his hands tog..."
links.text: "Wonderful!" He claps his hands together.

links.title: You: ""Here, I've got a Potent Pilsner."..."
links.text: "Here, I've got a Potent Pilsner." (Give it.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Not much, but it will do..." He gr..."
links.text: "Not much, but it will do..." He grabs the bottle from your hand and uncorks it immediately.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""This last one is the most Martinai..."
links.text: "This last one is the most Martinaise story I've ever heard..." He takes an almost comically long swig. Thus fortified, he continues.

links.title: You: ""I've got this weird bottle of pale..."
links.text: "I've got this weird bottle of pale-aged vodka." (Give it.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Let me see..." He takes the bottle..."
links.text: "Let me see..." He takes the bottle and inspects it closely. "Ah, very high concept, thanks."

links.title: You: ""I've got some sweet *Commodore Red..."
links.text: "I've got some sweet *Commodore Red*." (Give it.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Classy." He snatches the bottle an..."
links.text: "Classy." He snatches the bottle and pushes the cork in through the bottleneck.

links.title: You: ""I got this special strike brew the..."
links.text: "I got this special strike brew the Union uses." (Give it.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Interesting." He grabs the thermal..."
links.text: "Interesting." He grabs the thermal cup and shakes it. "Ah, this is what they use to keep the working man going."

links.title: You: ""I've got this blue medicinal spiri..."
links.text: "I've got this blue medicinal spirit, how about that?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He raises his palm as if to shun yo..."
links.text: He raises his palm as if to shun you back to wherever you came from. "No-no-no, contrary to popular belief, I enjoy being alive."

links.title: You: ""I don't have any on me right now.""
links.text: "I don't have any on me right now."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""If you find any, I'd be extremely..."
links.text: "If you find any, I'd be extremely grateful."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Cotton mouth is keeping my tongue..."
links.text: "Cotton mouth is keeping my tongue imprisoned." He shrugs his shoulders dramatically.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Then I will see you again once you..."
links.text: "Then I will see you again once you've procured some. *Par example*," he lifts his hands and spreads them wide, "my good friend Rosemary here sells all kinds of stuff."

links.title: Rosemary: ""All kinds sir. Beer *and* wine.""
links.text: "All kinds sir. Beer *and* wine."

links.title: You: ""I don't have any on me right now."..."
links.text: "I don't have any on me right now." (Lie.)

links.title: You: ""I don't want to give you any alcoh..."
links.text: "I don't want to give you any alcohol. I'm not an enabler." (Don't do it now.)

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""In that case, I'm not a storytelle..."
links.text: "In that case, I'm not a storyteller." He crosses his legs and turns his gaze towards the ground.

links.title: You: ""Have you got any more stories?""
links.text: "Have you got any more stories?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I do -- but as you can see my fuel..."
links.text: "I do -- but as you can see my fuel tank is running quite low, if you catch my drift..." He spins the bottle in his hand. Not a single drop of liquid remains.

links.title: You: ""Have you got any more urban myths?""
links.text: "Have you got any more urban myths?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I actually do have one... the stra..."
links.text: "I actually do have one... the strangest of them all. But I'll need to *fortify* myself before I can tell that one..."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Do you have anything to fortify ol..."
links.text: "Do you have anything to fortify ol' Doom Spiral? Tell me you got some story juice."

links.title: You: ""Are there any more stories you can..."
links.text: "Are there any more stories you can tell?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Not that I can think of, currently.""
links.text: "Not that I can think of, currently."

links.title: You: ""I guess that makes sense. You have..."
links.text: "I guess that makes sense. You have been drinking *a lot*."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That might be the case, yes.""
links.text: "That might be the case, yes."

links.title: You: ""I brought you some booze. Will you..."
links.text: "I brought you some booze. Will you tell me about your name now?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Of course -- drink first, story la..."
links.text: "Of course -- drink first, story later." He holds out his palm.

links.title: You: ""I got you some more booze, can you..."
links.text: "I got you some more booze, can you tell me the next story now?"

links.title: You: ""Found another batch of alcohol, ca..."
links.text: "Found another batch of alcohol, can you tell me the third story now?"

links.title: You: ""Be seein' you." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Be seein' you." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, let's step aside for a secon..."
links.text: "Okay, let's step aside for a second, I have something I want to talk about."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You too, Tequila Sunset!""
links.text: "You too, Tequila Sunset!"

dialogueTree.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hey, Tequila! Welcome to reality...."
dialogueTree.text: "Hey, Tequila! Welcome to reality. How's it treating you?" A thirty-something Lickra(TM)-clad man takes a sip from his beer.

links.title: You: ""Wait, Tequila?""
links.text: "Wait, Tequila?"

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, Tequila Sunset!" He takes a..."
links.text: "Yeah, Tequila Sunset!" He takes a sip, "How are the, uhm, high-concept, reality-based adventures proceeding?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "He says it like it's obviously your..."
links.text: He says it like it's obviously your name. Like you call someone Billy Brunuel or 'Leader of the Fourth Street Gang'.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Good, these people know your *true*..."
links.text: Good, these people know your *true* name. Looks like it has preceded you, Mr. Sunset. More on that later.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "I like this guy. You should, too. H..."
links.text: I like this guy. You should, too. He *respects* you by calling you your *true name*.

links.title: You: ""Not too hot. I'm on a 50-year losi..."
links.text: "Not too hot. I'm on a 50-year losing streak."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's harsh. I'm like three or ma..."
links.text: "That's harsh. I'm like three or maybe four years into mine. Wait no, make it five." He looks at his shit-stained Lickra(TM) with a grim expression.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Sadly, things aren't going that we..."
links.text: "Sadly, things aren't going that well in Idiot Doom Spiral Land. Haven't found those keys yet; haven't won that great piece of ass back. No word from my business-buddies..." He takes a sip from his beer.

links.title: You: ""Reality? It makes me aggressively..."
links.text: "Reality? It makes me aggressively sad."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I know what you mean. Sitting arou..."
links.text: "I know what you mean. Sitting around with these bums you really get to know the nitty-gritty of *reality*. And it isn't good." He looks at his buddies with mock appreciation.

links.title: You: ""Don't know. People tell me I'm a c..."
links.text: "Don't know. People tell me I'm a cop, I'm getting used to that."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It's good to hear that you're on t..."
links.text: "It's good to hear that you're on top of things. Talking about used to -- did you know that I *used* to be a real mover and shaker?" He thoughtfully picks at his shit-stained Lickra(TM) jacket.

links.title: You: ""I have re-entered reality to conqu..."
links.text: "I have re-entered reality to conquer it. To bend it to my will. I am the law."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's the spirit! I used to shape..."
links.text: "That's the spirit! I used to shape reality into my image. A long time ago. Those days are over now." He looks at his shit-stained Lickra(TM) jacket with a grim expression.

links.title: You: ""Reality? It's perishing. Soon only..."
links.text: "Reality? It's perishing. Soon only glowing embers will remain of the atoms; of human faces, only echoes."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not this again. I was hoping that..."
links.text: "Not this again. I was hoping that we were done with it."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Only echoes remaining of human fac..."
links.text: "Only echoes remaining of human faces? That's a pretty good apocalypse. I wouldn't mind if it came down to that." He nods appreciatively and picks at his shit-stained Lickra(TM) jacket.

links.title: You: ""Nothing special. Like everyone els..."
links.text: "Nothing special. Like everyone else. I have all sorts of wild thoughts running through my head, but then pick the most boring one."

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Things aren't going super well for..."
links.text: "Things aren't going super well for Idiot Doom Spiral either. Haven't found those keys yet; haven't won that great piece of ass back. No word from my business-buddies..." He takes a sip from his beer.

links.title: Suggestion: "This guy's your buddy-buddy. You fe..."
links.text: This guy's your buddy-buddy. You feel it immediately: you belong to an organization. A fraternity. Of *drunks*.

links.title: Conceptualization: "*Idiot Doom Spiral*, huh? This is b..."
links.text: *Idiot Doom Spiral*, huh? This is bound to be a good, high-concept conversation. At last!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Business buddies, huh? This guy mig..."
links.text: Business buddies, huh? This guy might be just what we're looking for. Ask him if he knows any Personal Brand Strategists who can help you out.

links.title: You: ""Well, nice meeting you but I've go..."
links.text: "Well, nice meeting you but I've got to go." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hey, Tequila!" A thirty-something..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hey, Tequila!" A thirty-something man clad in a two-piece Lickra(TM) tracksuit puts down his pilsner and extends his hand in greeting.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Good to see you! How's business? H..."
links.text: "Good to see you! How's business? How's the whole *reality situation* treating you?"

links.title: You: "Shake his hand."
links.text: Shake his hand.

links.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""So what's happening?" He picks up..."
links.text: "So what's happening?" He picks up his beer.

links.title: You: "Don't shake his hand."
links.text: Don't shake his hand.
